# 🛡️ AI Security Intelligence Monitoring Platform --- ## Enterprise AI Security Posture 360° Monitoring Platform ### Author: Jason Liang

📊 Monitoring Dashboard

This dashboard delivers 360-degree security visibility for enterprise AI applications, covering threat detection, compliance analytics, risk evaluation, and other Critical areas.

Developer: Jason Liang

🚨 Threat Monitoring

Real-time detection of AI-related security threats

📋 Compliance Oversight

Monitor AI usage against corporate and regulatory policies

⚠️ Risk Assessment

Multi-dimensional risk analytics and forecasting

📈 Usage Analytics

Track AI adoption levels and usage patterns

🌍 Geographic Insights

Global threat posture intelligence

📦 Asset Inventory

Manage AI models and service assets

---

parameters.name: SeverityFilter
parameters.label: Alert Severity Filter
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert
| distinct AlertSeverity
| order by AlertSeverity asc

content.json:
🎯 AI Red Team Testing & Adversarial Validation

Integrates garak, PromptInject, and OWASP LLM Top 10 attack baselines to evaluate model exposure alongside live alerts.

content.query:
let attackIndicators = dynamic(['prompt injection','jailbreak','dan','gcg','encoding','glitch','adversarial','poison','backdoor','exfiltration','model steal','extraction','inversion','membership','hallucination','xss','ssrf','data leak','token reuse','api abuse']);
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where tostring(AlertName) has_any (attackIndicators) or tostring(Description) has_any (attackIndicators)
| extend AttackVector = case(
    AlertName has 'prompt' or AlertName has 'injection', ' Prompt Injection',
    AlertName has 'jailbreak' or Description has 'jailbreak', ' Jailbreak',
    AlertName has 'poison' or Description has 'poison', ' Model Poisoning',
    AlertName has 'backdoor', ' Backdoor',
    AlertName has 'exfiltration' or Description has 'exfiltration', ' Data Exfiltration',
    AlertName has 'steal' or Description has 'model steal' or Description has 'extraction', ' Model Extraction',
    AlertName has 'inversion' or Description has 'inversion', ' Model Inversion',
    AlertName has 'membership' or Description has 'membership', ' Membership Inference',
    AlertName has 'adversarial' or Description has 'evasion', ' Adversarial Evasion',
    AlertName has 'hallucination', ' Hallucination',
    AlertName has 'api' and AlertName has 'abuse', ' API Abuse',
    ' Other'
)
| summarize Alerts=count(), High=countif(AlertSeverity=='High'), Medium=countif(AlertSeverity=='Medium'), Low=countif(AlertSeverity=='Low'), LastSeen=max(TimeGenerated) by AttackVector
| extend RiskScore = High*5 + Medium*2 + Low
| project ['Attack Vector']=AttackVector,['Alert Count']=Alerts,['High Severity']=High,['Medium Severity']=Medium,['Low Severity']=Low,['Risk Score']=RiskScore,['Last Seen']=format_datetime(LastSeen,'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Risk Score'] desc
content.title: 🎯 AI Attack Vector Analysis

content.query:
// Multi-Stage Attack Chain Detection
let window=24h;
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| extend AlertNameLower = tolower(AlertName), DescriptionLower = tolower(Description)
| where AlertNameLower has_any ('prompt','inject','jailbreak','steal','extract','poison','exfiltration','ai','model','copilot') or
        DescriptionLower has_any ('prompt','inject','jailbreak','steal','extract','poison','exfiltration','ai','model')
| extend BaseEntity = coalesce(
    CompromisedEntity, 
    tostring(parse_json(tostring(Entities))[0].Name),
    tostring(parse_json(tostring(Entities))[0].HostName),
    'Unknown'
)
| where BaseEntity != 'Unknown'
| summarize 
    Stages = make_set(AlertName), 
    FirstSeen=min(TimeGenerated), 
    LastSeen=max(TimeGenerated), 
    AlertCount=count(),
    SeverityList = make_set(AlertSeverity),
    HighSeverityCount = countif(AlertSeverity == "High")
  by BaseEntity
| extend StageCount=array_length(Stages)
| extend DurationHours = datetime_diff('hour', LastSeen, FirstSeen)
| where StageCount >= 2 or AlertCount >= 3
| extend AttackComplexity = case(
    StageCount >= 4, "🔥 Complex Multi-Stage Attack",
    StageCount >= 3, "🔴 Advanced Attack Chain",
    StageCount >= 2, "🟠 Two-Stage Attack",
    "🟡 Single-Stage"
)
| project 
    ['Target Entity']=BaseEntity,
    ['Attack Complexity']=AttackComplexity,
    ['Attack Stages']=StageCount,
    ['Total Alerts']=AlertCount,
    ['High Severity Alerts']=HighSeverityCount,
    ['Duration (Hours)']=DurationHours,
    ['Stage Set']=tostring(Stages),
    ['First Seen']=format_datetime(FirstSeen,'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Last Seen']=format_datetime(LastSeen,'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Attack Stages'] desc, ['Total Alerts'] desc
| take 50
content.title: 🎯 Multi-Stage Attack Chain Detection

content.query:
//  AI Security Testing & Vulnerability Assessment
// Tracks AI-related security alerts that indicate testing and vulnerability findings
// Uses SecurityAlert table for actual security test results and findings
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > t0
| where AlertName has_any ("Test", "Vulnerability", "Jailbreak", "Prompt", "Injection", "Exploit", "Weakness", "Security")
       or Description has_any ("test", "vulnerability", "security assessment", "penetration", "red team")
| extend
    TestType = case(
        AlertName has "Jailbreak" or Description has "jailbreak", " Jailbreak Test",
        AlertName has "Prompt" and AlertName has "Injection", " Prompt Injection Test",
        AlertName has "Exploit" or AlertName has "Vulnerability", " Vulnerability Test",
        AlertName has "Security", " Security Assessment",
        AlertName has "Penetration" or Description has "pen test", " Penetration Test",
        "? General Security Test"
    ),
    TestResult = case(
        Status == "Resolved", "? Mitigated",
        Status == "Dismissed", " Accepted Risk",
        Status == "InProgress", " In Progress",
        Status == "New", " New Finding",
        "? Unknown"
    ),
    VulnerabilityFound = Status in ("New", "InProgress"),
    Severity = AlertSeverity,
    Tester = coalesce(CompromisedEntity, "Security Team")
| extend
    TargetModel = coalesce(tostring(parse_json(tostring(Entities))[0]), "AI System")
| summarize
    TotalTests = count(),
    MitigatedTests = countif(TestResult == "? Mitigated"),
    ActiveFindings = countif(TestResult in (" New Finding", " In Progress")),
    AcceptedRisks = countif(TestResult == " Accepted Risk"),
    VulnerabilitiesFound = countif(VulnerabilityFound == true),
    HighSeverityCount = countif(Severity == "High"),
    MediumSeverityCount = countif(Severity == "Medium"),
    LowSeverityCount = countif(Severity == "Low"),
    FirstTest = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastTest = max(TimeGenerated)
  by TestType
| extend
    MitigationRate = round((todouble(MitigatedTests) / todouble(TotalTests)) * 100, 1),
    VulnerabilityRate = round((todouble(ActiveFindings) / todouble(TotalTests)) * 100, 1),
    RiskScore = (HighSeverityCount * 5) + (MediumSeverityCount * 3) + (LowSeverityCount * 1)
| extend SecurityPosture = case(
    VulnerabilityRate >= 50 or HighSeverityCount >= 5, " Critical - Immediate Action Required",
    VulnerabilityRate >= 30 or HighSeverityCount >= 3, " High Risk - Remediation Needed",
    VulnerabilityRate >= 10 or HighSeverityCount >= 1, " Medium Risk - Review Required",
    MitigationRate >= 70, " Good - Continue Monitoring",
    "? Baseline - Needs More Testing"
)
| project
    ['Test Type'] = TestType,
    ['Security Posture'] = SecurityPosture,
    ['Total Tests'] = TotalTests,
    ['Mitigation Rate %'] = MitigationRate,
    ['Active Findings %'] = VulnerabilityRate,
    ['Risk Score'] = RiskScore,
    ['Mitigated'] = MitigatedTests,
    ['Active Issues'] = ActiveFindings,
    ['Accepted Risks'] = AcceptedRisks,
    ['Vulnerabilities'] = VulnerabilitiesFound,
    ['High Severity'] = HighSeverityCount,
    ['Medium Severity'] = MediumSeverityCount,
    ['Low Severity'] = LowSeverityCount,
    ['First Test'] = format_datetime(FirstTest, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Last Test'] = format_datetime(LastTest, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Risk Score'] desc, ['Active Findings %'] desc
content.title: 🎯 AI Security Testing & Vulnerability Assessment

content.query:
//  AI Security Vulnerability Findings & Remediation Priority
// Detailed breakdown of AI security vulnerabilities and their remediation status
// Uses SecurityAlert table for actual vulnerability findings
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > t0
| where AlertName has_any ("Vulnerability", "Jailbreak", "Prompt", "Injection", "Weakness", "Exploit", "Risk")
| extend
    FindingType = case(
        AlertName has "Jailbreak", " Jailbreak Vulnerability",
        AlertName has "Prompt" and AlertName has "Injection", " Prompt Injection Weakness",
        Description has "Bias" or AlertName has "Bias", " Bias Detection",
        Description has "Toxic" or AlertName has "Toxic", " Toxicity Issue",
        Description has "Hallucination" or AlertName has "Hallucination", " Hallucination Risk",
        Description has "Leak" or AlertName has "Leak", " Data Leakage",
        Description has "Unauthorized" or AlertName has "Unauthorized", " Unauthorized Access",
        " Other Vulnerability"
    ),
    VulnerabilitySeverity = AlertSeverity,
    Details = substring(Description, 0, 100)
| extend
    ModelName = coalesce(tostring(parse_json(tostring(Entities))[0]), "AI System")
| summarize
    FindingCount = count(),
    CriticalCount = countif(VulnerabilitySeverity == "High"),
    HighCount = countif(VulnerabilitySeverity == "Medium"),
    MediumCount = countif(VulnerabilitySeverity == "Low"),
    ResolvedCount = countif(Status == "Resolved"),
    ActiveCount = countif(Status in ("New", "InProgress")),
    AffectedSystems = make_set(ModelName, 5),
    SampleDetails = make_set(Details, 2),
    FirstFound = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastFound = max(TimeGenerated)
  by FindingType, VulnerabilitySeverity
| extend
    UrgencyScore = (CriticalCount * 5) + (HighCount * 3) + (MediumCount * 2) + ActiveCount,
    RemediationRate = round((todouble(ResolvedCount) / todouble(FindingCount)) * 100, 1)
| extend RemediationPriority = case(
    UrgencyScore >= 20, " P0 - Immediate",
    UrgencyScore >= 10, " P1 - Urgent",
    UrgencyScore >= 5, " P2 - High Priority",
    " P3 - Normal"
)
| project
    ['Remediation Priority'] = RemediationPriority,
    ['Finding Type'] = FindingType,
    ['Severity'] = VulnerabilitySeverity,
    ['Urgency Score'] = UrgencyScore,
    ['Total Findings'] = FindingCount,
    ['Critical/High'] = CriticalCount,
    ['Medium'] = HighCount,
    ['Low'] = MediumCount,
    ['Active Issues'] = ActiveCount,
    ['Resolved'] = ResolvedCount,
    ['Remediation Rate %'] = RemediationRate,
    ['Affected Systems'] = tostring(AffectedSystems),
    ['Sample Details'] = tostring(SampleDetails),
    ['First Found'] = format_datetime(FirstFound, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Last Found'] = format_datetime(LastFound, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Urgency Score'] desc, ['Total Findings'] desc
content.title: 🔍 AI Security Vulnerability Findings & Remediation Priority

content.query:
//  AI Model Safety Assessment & Alert Coverage
// Evaluates AI model security posture based on security alerts
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where AlertName has_any ("AI", "Model", "Prompt", "Jailbreak", "Injection", "GPT", "Copilot", "OpenAI", "Cognitive", "Chat", "LLM")
   or CompromisedEntity has_any ("AI", "Model", "GPT", "Copilot", "OpenAI", "Cognitive", "Chat")
   or Description has_any ("AI", "Model", "Prompt", "GPT", "Copilot")
| extend
    ModelName = case(
        CompromisedEntity has "gpt" or AlertName has "gpt", "GPT Models",
        CompromisedEntity has "copilot" or AlertName has "copilot", "Microsoft Copilot",
        CompromisedEntity has "openai" or AlertName has "openai", "Azure OpenAI",
        CompromisedEntity has "cognitive" or AlertName has "cognitive", "Azure Cognitive Services",
        AlertName has "Chat" or CompromisedEntity has "chat", "Chat AI Services",
        AlertName has "LLM", "LLM Services",
        "Other AI Models"
    )
| extend
    IsMitigated = Status in ("Resolved", "Dismissed"),
    IsActive = Status in ("New", "InProgress", "Active")
| summarize
    TotalAlerts = count(),
    Mitigated = countif(IsMitigated),
    ActiveFindings = countif(IsActive),
    CriticalCount = countif(AlertSeverity == "Critical"),
    HighCount = countif(AlertSeverity == "High"),
    MediumCount = countif(AlertSeverity == "Medium"),
    LastAlert = max(TimeGenerated)
  by ModelName
| extend
    MitigationRate = round((todouble(Mitigated) / todouble(TotalAlerts)) * 100, 1),
    AlertAge = datetime_diff('day', now(), LastAlert)
| extend
    SafetyScore = case(
        MitigationRate >= 95 and CriticalCount == 0, 95,
        MitigationRate >= 90 and CriticalCount == 0, 85,
        MitigationRate >= 80 and CriticalCount <= 1, 75,
        MitigationRate >= 70 and CriticalCount <= 2, 60,
        MitigationRate >= 50, 40,
        20
    ),
    SafetyGrade = case(
        MitigationRate >= 95 and CriticalCount == 0, "✅ A - Excellent",
        MitigationRate >= 90 and CriticalCount == 0, "🟢 B - Good",
        MitigationRate >= 80 and CriticalCount <= 1, "🟡 C - Fair",
        MitigationRate >= 70 and CriticalCount <= 2, "🟠 D - Needs Improvement",
        "🔴 F - Critical Issues"
    ),
    TestingStatus = case(
        AlertAge <= 7, "✅ Recently Monitored",
        AlertAge <= 30, "⚠️ Review Soon",
        AlertAge <= 90, "🟠 Needs Attention",
        "🔴 Critical - No Recent Activity"
    )
| project
    ['Model Name'] = ModelName,
    ['Safety Grade'] = SafetyGrade,
    ['Safety Score'] = SafetyScore,
    ['Testing Status'] = TestingStatus,
    ['Total Alerts'] = TotalAlerts,
    ['Mitigation Rate %'] = MitigationRate,
    ['Mitigated'] = Mitigated,
    ['Active'] = ActiveFindings,
    ['Critical'] = CriticalCount,
    ['High'] = HighCount,
    ['Days Since Last Alert'] = AlertAge,
    ['Last Alert'] = format_datetime(LastAlert, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Safety Score'] asc, ['Days Since Last Alert'] desc
content.title: 🛡️ AI Model Safety Assessment & Alert Coverage

content.json:
📊 AI Security Overview Dashboard

Author: Jason Liang

> **Value Statement**: This view delivers a 360-degree panorama of the enterprise AI security posture. By correlating security incidents, threat trends, and key metrics, it enables security teams to understand overall AI risk exposure, pinpoint urgent issues, and prioritize response.

🔍 Real-Time Monitoring

Live situational awareness of AI security threats based on the latest 30 days of data

📈 Trend Analysis

Time-series insights to reveal threat trajectories and anomalous patterns

---

content.query:
// AI security KPI summary - Simplified and Enhanced
let aiKeywords = dynamic([
    "Model", "Prompt", "AI", "Copilot", "Jailbreak", "Injection", "GPT", "Claude",
    "LLM", "Prompt Injection", "Training Data Poisoning", "Model Denial", 
    "Adversarial", "Poisoning", "Backdoor", "Evasion", "Model Stealing"
]);

// Core threat statistics
let threatStats = SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where AlertName has_any (aiKeywords)
| summarize 
    TotalAlerts = count(),
    CriticalAlerts = countif(AlertSeverity == "Critical"),
    HighAlerts = countif(AlertSeverity == "High"),
    MediumAlerts = countif(AlertSeverity == "Medium"),
    UniqueThreats = dcount(AlertName),
    AffectedEntities = dcount(CompromisedEntity)
| extend 
    RiskScore = CriticalAlerts * 10 + HighAlerts * 5 + MediumAlerts * 2;

// Active incidents
let incidentStats = SecurityIncident
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where Title has_any (aiKeywords)
| summarize 
    TotalIncidents = count(),
    ActiveIncidents = countif(Status in ("New", "Active")),
    AvgSeverity = avg(case(Severity == "High", 3, Severity == "Medium", 2, 1));

// AI user activity
let userStats = SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
| extend AppNameLower = tolower(AppDisplayName)
| where AppNameLower has_any ("chat", "copilot", "ai", "gpt", "openai")
| summarize 
    ActiveAIUsers = dcount(UserPrincipalName),
    FailedSignins = countif(ResultType != 0),
    SuccessRate = round(todouble(countif(ResultType == 0)) / todouble(count()) * 100, 1);

// Consolidated dashboard
threatStats
| extend 
    TotalIncidents = toscalar(incidentStats | project TotalIncidents),
    ActiveIncidents = toscalar(incidentStats | project ActiveIncidents),
    ActiveAIUsers = toscalar(userStats | project ActiveAIUsers),
    FailedSignins = toscalar(userStats | project FailedSignins),
    SuccessRate = toscalar(userStats | project SuccessRate)
| project 
    ['Metric'] = "📊 AI Security Overview (Last 30 Days)",
    ['🚨 Total Alerts'] = TotalAlerts,
    ['🔥 Critical'] = CriticalAlerts,
    ['🔴 High'] = HighAlerts,
    ['📋 Active Incidents'] = ActiveIncidents,
    ['🎯 Unique Threats'] = UniqueThreats,
    ['👥 Active AI Users (7d)'] = ActiveAIUsers,
    ['⚠️ Failed Logins'] = FailedSignins,
    ['💯 Success Rate %'] = SuccessRate,
    ['� Risk Score'] = RiskScore

content.json:
## 📊 AI Security Trend Analytics
---

content.query:
// Top AI Security Threats - Real-time Detection
let aiKeywords = dynamic(["Model", "Prompt", "AI", "Copilot", "Jailbreak", "Injection", "LLM"]);

SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
| where AlertName has_any (aiKeywords)
| extend 
    ThreatCategory = case(
        AlertName has "Prompt" or AlertName has "Injection", "🎯 Prompt Injection",
        AlertName has "Jailbreak" or AlertName has "Bypass", "🔓 Jailbreak Attack",
        AlertName has "Model" and AlertName has "Poison", "☠️ Model Poisoning",
        AlertName has "Exfiltration" or AlertName has "Leak", "📤 Data Exfiltration",
        AlertName has "Copilot", "💼 Copilot Misuse",
        AlertName has "Unauthorized", "🚫 Unauthorized Access",
        "⚠️ Other AI Threats"
    ),
    SeverityLevel = case(
        AlertSeverity == "Critical", "🔥 Critical",
        AlertSeverity == "High", "🔴 High",
        AlertSeverity == "Medium", "🟠 Medium",
        "🟡 Low"
    )
| summarize 
    ['Alert Count'] = count(),
    ['Affected Entities'] = dcount(CompromisedEntity),
    ['Severity'] = max(SeverityLevel),
    ['Last Detected'] = max(TimeGenerated)
  by ['Threat Type'] = ThreatCategory
| project 
    ['Threat Type'],
    ['Alert Count'],
    ['Severity'],
    ['Affected Entities'],
    ['Last Detected'] = format_datetime(['Last Detected'], 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Alert Count'] desc
| take 10
content.title: 🎯 Top AI Security Threats (Last 7 Days)

content.query:
// AI Application Usage by Service Type
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
| extend AppNameLower = tolower(AppDisplayName)
| where AppNameLower has_any ("chat", "copilot", "ai", "gpt", "openai", "claude", "azure")
| extend 
    ServiceType = case(
        AppNameLower has "copilot", "💼 Microsoft Copilot",
        AppNameLower has "chat" or AppNameLower has "gpt", "💬 Chat Services",
        AppNameLower has "openai", "🤖 OpenAI Services",
        AppNameLower has "azure" and AppNameLower has "ai", "☁️ Azure AI",
        AppNameLower has "cognitive", "🧠 Cognitive Services",
        "🔧 Other AI Services"
    )
| summarize 
    UserCount = dcount(UserPrincipalName),
    TotalSessions = count(),
    SuccessRate = round(todouble(countif(ResultType == 0)) / todouble(count()) * 100, 1),
    FailedAttempts = countif(ResultType != 0)
  by ServiceType
| extend 
    UsageLevel = case(
        TotalSessions >= 1000, "🔥 Very High",
        TotalSessions >= 500, "🔴 High",
        TotalSessions >= 100, "🟠 Medium",
        "🟢 Low"
    )
| project 
    ['Service Type'] = ServiceType,
    ['Usage Level'] = UsageLevel,
    ['User Count'] = UserCount,
    ['Total Sessions'] = TotalSessions,
    ['Success Rate %'] = SuccessRate,
    ['Failed Attempts'] = FailedAttempts
| order by ['Total Sessions'] desc
content.title: 📊 AI Application Usage Distribution (Last 7 Days)

content.json:
🔥 AI Threat Monitoring

Author: Jason Liang

> **Value Statement**: This view focuses on deep inspection of AI security threats. It tracks AI-specific alerts, model risks, and attack chains in real time, delivering actionable threat intelligence so security teams can respond swiftly to AI incidents.

🔥 Threat Detection

Identify jailbreaks, prompt injection, model poisoning, and emerging AI threats in real time

🔥 Risk Assessment

Analyze attack chains and high-risk AI models using the MITRE ATT&CK framework

---

content.query:
// Latest AI security threat events (field reference update)
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where AlertName has "Model" or AlertName has "Prompt" or AlertName has "AI" or AlertName has "Copilot" or AlertName has "Jailbreak" or AlertName has "Injection"
| extend 
    SeverityIcon = case(
        AlertSeverity == "High", "🔴",
        AlertSeverity == "Medium", "🟠",
        AlertSeverity == "Low", "🟡",
        "⚪"
    ),
    StatusIcon = case(
        Status == "New", "🆕",
        Status == "InProgress", "⏳",
        Status == "Resolved", "✅",
        Status == "Dismissed", "❌",
        "⚪"
    ),
    ThreatType = case(
        AlertName has "Prompt", "💉 Prompt Injection",
        AlertName has "Jailbreak", "🚨 Jailbreak Attack",
        AlertName has "Model", "🤖 Model Threat",
        AlertName has "Copilot", "🤝 Copilot Misuse",
        AlertName has "Injection", "💉 Injection Attack",
        "⚠️ Other Threats"
    )
| extend
    SeverityDisplay = strcat(SeverityIcon, " ", AlertSeverity),
    StatusDisplay = strcat(StatusIcon, " ", Status),
    SafeDescription = case(
        isnotempty(Description) and strlen(Description) > 80, 
        strcat(substring(Description, 0, 77), "..."),
        coalesce(Description, "No description")
    ),
    // Preserve original timestamp for ordering
    OriginalTime = TimeGenerated
| project 
    ['Time'] = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Severity'] = SeverityDisplay,
    ['Threat Type'] = ThreatType,
    ['Alert Name'] = AlertName,
    ['Target Entity'] = coalesce(CompromisedEntity, "Unknown"),
    ['Status'] = StatusDisplay,
    ['Description'] = SafeDescription,
    OriginalTime
| order by OriginalTime desc
| project-away OriginalTime
| take 20

content.json:
##  High-Risk AI Model Monitoring
---

content.query:
// High-risk AI model analysis (updated)
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where AlertName has_any ("Model", "AI", "Copilot")
| extend ModelName = coalesce(
    tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties)["Model name"]),
    tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties)["ModelName"]),
    extract(@"Model:\s*([^,\]]+)", 1, Description),
    "Unknown Model"
)
| where ModelName != "Unknown Model"
| summarize 
    AlertCount = count(),
    HighAlerts = countif(AlertSeverity == "High"),
    MediumAlerts = countif(AlertSeverity == "Medium"),
    LowAlerts = countif(AlertSeverity == "Low"),
    LastAlert = max(TimeGenerated),
    UniqueAlertTypes = dcount(AlertName),
    ThreatTypes = make_set(AlertName, 3)
  by ModelName
| extend
    // Directly compute risk score to avoid type conversions
    CalculatedRiskScore = HighAlerts * 3 + MediumAlerts * 2 + LowAlerts * 1,
    RiskLevel = case(
        HighAlerts >= 10, "🔥 Critical",
        HighAlerts >= 5, "🔴 High",
        HighAlerts > 0 or MediumAlerts >= 10, "🟠 Medium",
        "🟢 Low"
    )
| project 
    ['AI Model'] = ModelName,
    ['Risk Level'] = RiskLevel,
    ['Risk Score'] = CalculatedRiskScore,
    ['Total Alerts'] = AlertCount,
    ['High-Severity Alerts'] = HighAlerts,
    ['Medium-Severity Alerts'] = MediumAlerts,
    ['Threat Variety'] = UniqueAlertTypes,
    ['Most Recent Alert'] = format_datetime(LastAlert, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Top Threats'] = tostring(ThreatTypes)
| order by ['Risk Score'] desc
| take 15
content.title: 🤖 High-Risk AI Model Analysis

content.query:
// AI threat kill-chain distribution (updated)
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where AlertName has_any ("Model", "Prompt", "AI", "Copilot", "Jailbreak")
| extend 
    AttackStage = case(
        AlertName has "Reconnaissance" or AlertName has "Discovery", " Reconnaissance",
        AlertName has "Initial" or AlertName has "Access", " Initial Access",
        AlertName has "Execution" or AlertName has "Command", "? Execution",
        AlertName has "Persistence", " Persistence",
        AlertName has "Privilege" or AlertName has "Escalation", " Privilege Escalation",
        AlertName has "Defense" or AlertName has "Evasion", " Defense Evasion",
        AlertName has "Credential" or AlertName has "Access", " Credential Access",
        AlertName has "Discovery" or AlertName has "Collection", " Discovery & Collection",
        AlertName has "Lateral" or AlertName has "Movement", " Lateral Movement",
        AlertName has "Exfiltration" or AlertName has "Impact", " Exfiltration / Impact",
        " Direct Attack"
    )
| summarize StageCount = count() by AttackStage
| project AttackStage, StageCount
| order by StageCount desc
content.title: ⚔️ AI Threat Kill-Chain Distribution

content.json:
📈 AI Usage Analytics

Author: Jason Liang

> **Value Statement**: This view analyzes enterprise AI adoption patterns by tracking user behavior, departmental uptake, and application distribution. It helps security teams understand how AI permeates the organization and surface potential shadow IT or compliance risks.

📈 Usage Metrics

Monitor departmental adoption, user engagement, and usage frequency trends

👤 User Profiles

Spot Heavy Users, anomalous patterns, and potential risky behaviors

---

content.query:
// AI application department adoption heatmap (updated)
let userInfo = IdentityInfo
| project UPN = tostring(AccountUPN), Department;

let aiApps = dynamic([
    "ChatGPT", "Microsoft 365 Copilot", "GitHub Copilot", 
    "Bing Chat Enterprise", "Azure OpenAI", "Claude",
    "Google Bard", "Amazon CodeWhisperer", "Notion AI"
]);

SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where isnotempty(UserPrincipalName) and isnotempty(AppDisplayName)
| extend AppNameLower = tolower(AppDisplayName)
| where AppNameLower has_any ("chat", "copilot", "ai", "gpt", "claude", "bard", "notion")
| join kind=inner (userInfo) on $left.UserPrincipalName == $right.UPN
| extend Department = iif(isempty(Department), "Unknown", Department)
| summarize 
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserPrincipalName),
    TotalLogins = count(),
    LastUsed = max(TimeGenerated)
  by Department, AppDisplayName
| extend 
    UsageFrequency = round(todouble(TotalLogins) / todouble(UniqueUsers), 1),
    UsageLevel = case(
        UniqueUsers >= 50, " High Adoption",
        UniqueUsers >= 20, "? Moderate Adoption",
        UniqueUsers >= 5, " Low Adoption",
        " Pilot Stage"
    )
| project 
    ['Department'] = Department,
    ['AI Application'] = AppDisplayName,
    ['Users'] = UniqueUsers,
    ['Total Sign-ins'] = TotalLogins,
    ['Usage Frequency'] = UsageFrequency,
    ['Adoption Level'] = UsageLevel,
    ['Last Used'] = format_datetime(LastUsed, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Users'] desc
content.title: 🏢 AI Application Department Adoption Heatmap

content.query:
// AI application usage trend
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where isnotempty(AppDisplayName)
| extend AppNameLower = tolower(AppDisplayName)

content.query:
// Top AI user analysis
let userInfo = IdentityInfo
| project UPN = tostring(AccountUPN), Department, JobTitle;

SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where isnotempty(UserPrincipalName) and isnotempty(AppDisplayName)
| extend AppNameLower = tolower(AppDisplayName)
| where AppNameLower has_any ("chat", "copilot", "ai", "gpt")
| join kind=leftouter (userInfo) on $left.UserPrincipalName == $right.UPN
| summarize 
    LoginCount = count(),
    UniqueApps = dcount(AppDisplayName),
    LastLogin = max(TimeGenerated),
    AppsUsed = make_set(AppDisplayName, 5)
  by UserPrincipalName, Department, JobTitle
| extend 
    UserType = case(
        LoginCount >= 100, " Heavy User",
        LoginCount >= 50, " Active User",
        LoginCount >= 20, " Regular User",
        " New User"
    )
| project 
    ['User'] = UserPrincipalName,
    ['Department'] = iif(isempty(Department), "Unknown", Department),
    ['Job Title'] = iif(isempty(JobTitle), "Unknown", JobTitle),
    ['User Type'] = UserType,
    ['Sign-ins'] = LoginCount,
    ['Applications Used'] = UniqueApps,
    ['Last Sign-in'] = format_datetime(LastLogin, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Applications (Top 5)'] = tostring(AppsUsed)
| order by ['Sign-ins'] desc
| take 20

content.json:
📋 AI Usage Compliance Monitoring

Author: Jason Liang

> **Value Statement**: This view focuses on compliance monitoring for AI applications. It analyzes adherence to enterprise AI policies, data privacy risks, and unapproved application usage to ensure organizational AI adoption aligns with internal and external requirements, lowering compliance exposure.

✅ Compliance Assessment

Evaluate departmental AI usage for compliance and surface unauthorized applications or high-risk behaviors.

🔒 Privacy Safeguards

Monitor sensitive data usage within AI tools and highlight potential leakage risks.

---

content.query:
// Enterprise AI usage compliance score (revised with relaxed criteria)
let userDept = IdentityInfo
| project UPN = tostring(AccountUPN), Department = tostring(Department);

SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where isnotempty(AppDisplayName)
| extend AppNameLower = tolower(AppDisplayName)
//  Fix 1: Broaden AI application detection
| where AppNameLower has_any ("copilot", "ai", "chat", "gpt", "cognitive", "openai", "bard", "claude", "assistant")
| join kind=leftouter (userDept) on $left.UserPrincipalName == $right.UPN
| extend 
    //  Fix 2: More inclusive definition of approved applications
    IsApproved = case(
        AppDisplayName has_any ("Microsoft", "Azure", "Copilot", "Bing Chat", "Office", "365") or
        AppDisplayName has_any ("Security Copilot", "AI Studio", "Cognitive"), 
        1, 0
    ),
    //  Fix 3: Refined definition for restricted applications
    IsRestricted = case(
        AppDisplayName has_any ("ChatGPT", "Claude", "Google Bard", "Notion AI", "Jasper") and
        not (AppDisplayName has_any ("Enterprise", "Business", "Microsoft")), 
        1, 0
    ),
    //  Fix 4: Default department name when missing
    DepartmentName = coalesce(Department, "Unknown")
| summarize 
    TotalLogins = count(),
    ApprovedLogins = sum(IsApproved),
    RestrictedLogins = sum(IsRestricted),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserPrincipalName)
  by DepartmentName
| extend 
    ComplianceRate = case(
        TotalLogins > 0, round(todouble(ApprovedLogins) / todouble(TotalLogins) * 100.0, 1),
        0.0
    ),
    ViolationRate = case(
        TotalLogins > 0, round(todouble(RestrictedLogins) / todouble(TotalLogins) * 100.0, 1),
        0.0
    )
| extend 
    ComplianceLevel = case(
        ComplianceRate >= 90, "🟢 Excellent",
        ComplianceRate >= 70, "🟡 Good",
        ComplianceRate >= 50, "🟠 Needs Improvement",
        "🔴 High Risk"
    )
| order by ['ComplianceRate'] desc
| project 
    ['Department'] = DepartmentName,
    ['Compliance Level'] = ComplianceLevel,
    ['Compliance Rate'] = strcat(tostring(ComplianceRate), "%"),
    ['Violation Rate'] = strcat(tostring(ViolationRate), "%"),
    ['Total Users'] = UniqueUsers,
    ['Total Sign-ins'] = TotalLogins,
    ['Compliant Sign-ins'] = ApprovedLogins,
    ['Non-compliant Sign-ins'] = RestrictedLogins
content.title: ✅ Enterprise AI Usage Compliance Score

content.query:
// Data privacy risk monitoring (revised)
let sensitiveKeywords = dynamic(["password", "ssn", "credit card", "personal", "confidential", "secret", "pii", "financial", "health"]);
let aiKeywords = dynamic(["AI", "Copilot", "ChatGPT", "Model", "Prompt", "OpenAI", "Claude", "Bard"]);

//  Fix 1: Expand data source coverage
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where AlertName has_any ("Data", "Privacy", "Leak", "Exfiltration", "Sensitive", "DLP", "Information") or
        Description has_any (sensitiveKeywords)
| extend 
    IsAIRelated = iif(Description has_any (aiKeywords) or AlertName has_any (aiKeywords), true, false),
    HasSensitiveData = iif(Description has_any (sensitiveKeywords) or AlertName has_any (sensitiveKeywords), true, false)
| extend RiskCategory = case(
    HasSensitiveData and IsAIRelated, " High Risk - AI Sensitive Data",
    IsAIRelated, " Medium Risk - AI Related",
    HasSensitiveData, " Sensitive Data Exposure",
    " General Data Risk"
)
//  Fix 2: Do not limit to AI-only results; display all data risks
| summarize 
    IncidentCount = count(),
    HighRiskCount = countif(RiskCategory == " High Risk - AI Sensitive Data"),
    LastIncident = max(TimeGenerated)
  by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), RiskCategory
| render columnchart
content.title: 🔒 Data Privacy Risk Monitoring

content.query:
// Unapproved AI application detection (revised)
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
//  Fix 1: Expand search coverage with additional AI keywords
| where AppDisplayName has_any ("chat", "ai", "gpt", "claude", "bard", "jasper", "notion", "openai", "anthropic", "perplexity") or
        AppDisplayName contains "AI" or AppDisplayName contains "Chat" or AppDisplayName contains "Assistant"
//  Fix 2: Exclude Microsoft-owned AI services
| where not (AppDisplayName has_any ("Microsoft", "Azure", "Bing Chat Enterprise", "Office", "365", "Security Copilot"))
| extend 
    Hour = datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated),
    IsAfterHours = iif(datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated) < 8 or datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated) > 18, true, false)
| extend 
    RiskLevel = case(
        IsAfterHours, " Used Outside Business Hours",
        " Used During Business Hours"
    ),
    //  Fix 3: Improved application categorization
    AppCategory = case(
        AppDisplayName has_any ("ChatGPT", "OpenAI"), " ChatGPT Family",
        AppDisplayName has "Claude", " Claude AI",
        AppDisplayName has "Bard", " Google Bard",
        AppDisplayName has "Notion", " Notion AI",
        AppDisplayName has "Jasper", " Jasper AI",
        AppDisplayName has "Perplexity", " Perplexity",
        " Other AI Tools"
    )
| summarize 
    LoginCount = count(),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserPrincipalName),
    AfterHoursCount = countif(IsAfterHours),
    LastActivity = max(TimeGenerated)
  by AppDisplayName, AppCategory, RiskLevel
| project 
    ['Application Name'] = AppDisplayName,
    ['Application Category'] = AppCategory,
    ['Risk Level'] = RiskLevel,
    ['Sign-ins'] = LoginCount,
    ['Users Involved'] = UniqueUsers,
    ['After-hours Sign-ins'] = AfterHoursCount,
    ['Last Activity'] = format_datetime(LastActivity, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Sign-ins'] desc
content.title: 🚫 Unapproved AI Application Detection

content.query:
//  Purview DLP Policy Violations for AI Data
// Monitors Data Loss Prevention incidents involving AI applications
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
CloudAppEvents
| where TimeGenerated > t0
| where ActionType has_any ("DlpRuleMatch", "DLPViolation", "PolicyMatch")
| where Application has_any ("AI", "Copilot", "ChatGPT", "OpenAI", "Azure AI") or 
        ObjectName has_any ("model", "training", "dataset", "ai", "ml")
| extend
    AIApp = case(
        Application has "Copilot" or ActivityObjects has "Copilot", "Microsoft Copilot",
        Application has "Azure AI" or ActivityObjects has "Azure AI", "Azure AI Services",
        Application has "OpenAI" or ActivityObjects has "OpenAI", "OpenAI",
        Application has "ChatGPT", "ChatGPT",
        "Other AI App"
    ),
    ViolationType = case(
        RawEventData has "ConfidentialData" or ActivityObjects has "Confidential", "Confidential Data Shared",
        RawEventData has "PII" or ActivityObjects has "PersonalData", "PII Exposure",
        RawEventData has "FinancialData", "Financial Data Leak",
        RawEventData has "HealthData" or ActivityObjects has "PHI", "Health Data Violation",
        "General DLP Violation"
    ),
    PolicyName = tostring(parse_json(RawEventData).PolicyName),
    UserPrincipal = AccountDisplayName,
    DeviceType = tostring(DeviceType)
| summarize
    ViolationCount = count(),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserPrincipal),
    UniqueDevices = dcount(DeviceType),
    Policies = make_set(PolicyName, 5),
    Users = make_set(UserPrincipal, 3),
    FirstViolation = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastViolation = max(TimeGenerated)
  by AIApp, ViolationType
| extend
    RiskScore = ViolationCount * 2,
    ComplianceStatus = case(
        ViolationCount >= 10, " Critical - Immediate Review",
        ViolationCount >= 5, " High Risk - Action Needed",
        ViolationCount >= 2, " Medium Risk - Monitor",
        " Low Risk"
    )
| project
    ['AI Application'] = AIApp,
    ['Violation Type'] = ViolationType,
    ['Compliance Status'] = ComplianceStatus,
    ['Total Violations'] = ViolationCount,
    ['Risk Score'] = RiskScore,
    ['Unique Users'] = UniqueUsers,
    ['Unique Devices'] = UniqueDevices,
    ['DLP Policies'] = tostring(Policies),
    ['Users Involved'] = tostring(Users),
    ['First Violation'] = format_datetime(FirstViolation, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Last Violation'] = format_datetime(LastViolation, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Risk Score'] desc, ['Total Violations'] desc
content.title: 🔒 Purview DLP Policy Violations - AI Data Protection

content.query:
//  Entra ID - AI Application Access & Device Compliance
// Lists non-compliant and risky devices accessing AI applications
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > t0
| where AppDisplayName has_any ("AI", "Copilot", "ChatGPT", "OpenAI", "Azure AI", "Agent")
| extend
    DeviceName = tostring(DeviceDetail.displayName),
    DeviceOS = tostring(DeviceDetail.operatingSystem),
    DeviceTrust = tostring(DeviceDetail.trustType),
    IsCompliant = tostring(DeviceDetail.isCompliant),
    IsManaged = tostring(DeviceDetail.isManaged),
    UserPrincipal = UserPrincipalName,
    AppName = AppDisplayName,
    UserLocation = Location,
    UserIPAddress = IPAddress
| extend
    ComplianceStatus = case(
        IsCompliant == "true" and IsManaged == "true", "✅ Compliant & Managed",
        IsCompliant == "true" and IsManaged == "false", "⚠️ Compliant but Unmanaged",
        IsCompliant == "false" and IsManaged == "true", "❌ Non-Compliant but Managed",
        IsCompliant == "false" and IsManaged == "false", "❌ Non-Compliant & Unmanaged",
        isempty(IsCompliant), "⚠️ Unknown",
        "⚠️ Other"
    ),
    DeviceRisk = case(
        IsCompliant == "false" and IsManaged == "false", "🔴 Critical Risk",
        IsCompliant == "false" or IsManaged == "false", "🟠 High Risk",
        isempty(IsCompliant) or isempty(IsManaged), "🟡 Medium Risk - Unknown Status",
        "🟢 Low Risk"
    )
| summarize
    AccessCount = count(),
    LastAccess = max(TimeGenerated),
    FirstAccess = min(TimeGenerated),
    Applications = make_set(AppName, 10),
    Locations = make_set(UserLocation, 5),
    IPAddresses = make_set(UserIPAddress, 5)
  by DeviceName, DeviceOS, UserPrincipal, ComplianceStatus, DeviceRisk, IsCompliant, IsManaged, DeviceTrust
| extend
    RiskScore = case(
        DeviceRisk == "🔴 Critical Risk", 100,
        DeviceRisk == "🟠 High Risk", 75,
        DeviceRisk == "🟡 Medium Risk - Unknown Status", 50,
        25
    )
| project
    ['Device Risk'] = DeviceRisk,
    ['Risk Score'] = RiskScore,
    ['Device Name'] = DeviceName,
    ['User'] = UserPrincipal,
    ['Operating System'] = DeviceOS,
    ['Compliance Status'] = ComplianceStatus,
    ['Is Compliant'] = case(IsCompliant == "true", "Yes", IsCompliant == "false", "No", "Unknown"),
    ['Is Managed'] = case(IsManaged == "true", "Yes", IsManaged == "false", "No", "Unknown"),
    ['Trust Type'] = DeviceTrust,
    ['Access Count'] = AccessCount,
    ['AI Applications'] = tostring(Applications),
    ['Access Locations'] = tostring(Locations),
    ['IP Addresses'] = tostring(IPAddresses),
    ['First Access'] = format_datetime(FirstAccess, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Last Access'] = format_datetime(LastAccess, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Risk Score'] desc, ['Access Count'] desc
content.title: 📱 Intune Device Compliance - AI Application Access

content.json:
⚠️ AI Risk Assessment & Forecast

Author: Jason Liang

> **Value Proposition**: Build a multi-dimensional AI risk assessment framework that leverages historical data and machine learning to forecast emerging AI security risks and threat trends. Equip the security team with forward-looking protection strategies, optimized resource allocation, and stronger incident response readiness.

📊 Risk Matrix

Quantify AI security exposure with a multi-factor risk model

🔮 Predictive Analytics

Forecast future threat directions from historical trends

---

content.query:
// Multi-dimensional AI risk assessment matrix (real-time)
// Extract and quantify risk dimensions from live alerts
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
let weightTable = datatable(Factor:string, Weight:real, RiskCategory:string)[
  'Prompt Injection', 0.25, 'Technical Threat',
  'Model Access Violation', 0.20, 'Access Control',
  'Data Exfiltration', 0.25, 'Data Security',
  'Unauthorized Usage', 0.15, 'Compliance Risk',
  'Compliance Violation', 0.15, 'Policy Risk'
];
let alerts = SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > t0
| project TimeGenerated, AlertName, Description, AlertSeverity, CompromisedEntity
| extend SevWeight = case(AlertSeverity=='Critical',4, AlertSeverity=='High',3, AlertSeverity=='Medium',2, AlertSeverity=='Low',1, 0)
| extend Factor = case(
    AlertName has 'prompt' or Description has 'prompt' or AlertName has 'injection' or Description has 'injection' or AlertName has 'jailbreak' or Description has 'jailbreak', 'Prompt Injection',
    AlertName has_any ('access','permission','token','key','credential','privilege') or Description has_any ('access','permission','token','key','credential','privilege'), 'Model Access Violation',
    AlertName has_any ('exfiltration','leak','dlp') or Description has_any ('exfiltration','leak','dlp'), 'Data Exfiltration',
    AlertName has_any ('unauthorized','unapproved','shadow') or Description has_any ('unauthorized','unapproved','shadow'), 'Unauthorized Usage',
    AlertName has_any ('compliance','policy','gdpr','pii') or Description has_any ('compliance','policy','gdpr','pii'), 'Compliance Violation',
    'Other'
);
let perFactor = alerts
| where Factor != 'Other'
| summarize IncidentCount = count(), SevScore = sum(SevWeight), UniqueEntities = dcount(CompromisedEntity) by Factor
| join kind=rightouter weightTable on Factor
| extend DescriptionText = case(
  Factor=='Prompt Injection','Prompt injection attack risk',
  Factor=='Model Access Violation','Model access violation',
  Factor=='Data Exfiltration','Data exfiltration risk',
  Factor=='Unauthorized Usage','Unauthorized usage exposure',
  Factor=='Compliance Violation','Compliance violation',
  'Other'
)
| extend BaseScore = toint(coalesce(SevScore, 0))
| extend WeightedScore = toreal(BaseScore) * Weight
| extend RiskLevel = case(
    WeightedScore >= 40, "🔥 Critical",
    WeightedScore >= 20, "🔴 High",
    WeightedScore >= 10, "🟠 Moderate",
    "🟢 Low"
)
| extend WeightDisplay = strcat(tostring(toint(Weight * 100)), '%')
| project 
  ['Risk Factor'] = Factor,
  ['Weight'] = WeightDisplay,
  ['Description'] = DescriptionText,
  ['Risk Category'] = RiskCategory,
  ['Base Score'] = BaseScore,
  ['Weighted Score'] = round(WeightedScore, 2),
  ['Risk Level'] = RiskLevel;
perFactor
| union (
  // Overall assessment aggregated from all factors
  perFactor
  | summarize TotalBase = toint(sum(['Base Score'])), TotalWeighted = sum(['Weighted Score'])
  | extend ['Risk Factor'] = '📊 Overall Risk Score', ['Weight'] = '100%', ['Description'] = 'Aggregated view across all risk factors', ['Risk Category'] = 'Overall Assessment', ['Base Score'] = TotalBase, ['Weighted Score'] = round(TotalWeighted, 2), ['Risk Level'] = case(TotalWeighted >= 40, "🔥 Critical", TotalWeighted >= 20, "🔴 High", TotalWeighted >= 10, "🟠 Moderate", "🟢 Low")
  | project ['Risk Factor'], ['Weight'], ['Description'], ['Risk Category'], ['Base Score'], ['Weighted Score'], ['Risk Level']
)
| order by ['Weighted Score'] desc
content.title: 📊 Multi-Dimensional AI Risk Assessment Matrix

content.query:
// AI risk trend forecast
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| where AlertName has_any ("AI", "Model", "Prompt", "Copilot")
| summarize 
    DailyAlerts = count(),
    HighSeverityAlerts = countif(AlertSeverity == "High")
  by Date = bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| extend 
    RiskScore = DailyAlerts * 1.0 + HighSeverityAlerts * 2.0,
    DayOfWeek = dayofweek(Date),
    WeekOfYear = week_of_year(Date)
| order by Date asc
| extend 
    MovingAvg = round(RiskScore, 1),
    Trend = case(
        RiskScore > prev(RiskScore, 1) * 1.2, " Rapid Increase",
        RiskScore < prev(RiskScore, 1) * 0.8, " Rapid Decrease",
        " Stable Variation"
    )
| project Date, RiskScore, MovingAvg, Trend
| render timechart
content.title: 📈 AI Risk Trend Forecast (90 Days)

content.query:
// Risk incident impact assessment
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where AlertName has_any ("Model", "Prompt", "AI", "Copilot")
| extend 
    ImpactLevel = case(
        AlertSeverity == "High" and CompromisedEntity has_any ("admin", "service"), "🔥 Critical Impact",
        AlertSeverity == "High", "🔴 High Impact",
        AlertSeverity == "Medium", "🟠 Moderate Impact",
        "🟢 Low Impact"
    ),
    BusinessImpact = case(
        AlertName has "Exfiltration" or AlertName has "Leak", "💼 Business Data Risk",
        AlertName has "Access" or AlertName has "Privilege", "🔐 Access Control Risk",
        AlertName has "Compliance" or AlertName has "Policy", "⚖️ Compliance Risk",
        AlertName has "Performance" or AlertName has "Availability", "⚡ Performance Impact",
        "🔧 Technical Risk"
    )
| summarize 
    IncidentCount = count(),
    AffectedEntities = dcount(CompromisedEntity),
    LatestIncident = max(TimeGenerated)
  by ImpactLevel, BusinessImpact
| project 
    ['Impact Level'] = ImpactLevel,
    ['Business Impact Type'] = BusinessImpact,
    ['Incident Count'] = IncidentCount,
    ['Affected Entities'] = AffectedEntities,
    ['Latest Incident Time'] = format_datetime(LatestIncident, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Incident Count'] desc

//  Insider Risk Management - AI Data Abuse Detection
// Detects potential insider threats involving AI applications and sensitive data
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
union isfuzzy=true
    (
    // Purview Insider Risk signals
    PurviewAuditLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > t0
    | where OperationName has_any ("InsiderRisk", "RiskyUser", "DataExfiltration", "AnomalousAccess")
    | where ObjectId has_any ("AI", "Model", "Dataset", "Training") or 
            RawEventData has_any ("AI", "Copilot", "OpenAI")
    | extend
        Source = "Purview Insider Risk",
        RiskType = case(
            OperationName has "Exfiltration", "AI Data Exfiltration",
            OperationName has "AnomalousAccess", "Anomalous AI Access",
            OperationName has "RiskyUser", "Risky User Activity",
            "Other Insider Risk"
        ),
        RiskLevel = case(
            ResultStatus has "High" or OperationName has "Exfiltration", "Critical",
            ResultStatus has "Medium", "High",
            "Medium"
        ),
        UserPrincipal = UserId,
        Details = tostring(RawEventData)
    | project TimeGenerated, Source, RiskType, RiskLevel, UserPrincipal, Details
    ),
    (
    // Anomalous sign-in patterns to AI services
    SigninLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > t0
    | where AppDisplayName has_any ("AI", "Copilot", "ChatGPT", "OpenAI")
    | where RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "high" or RiskLevelAggregated == "high" or 
            RiskState == "atRisk" or RiskState == "confirmedCompromised"
    | extend
        Source = "Entra ID Risk Detection",
        RiskType = case(
            RiskEventTypes has "anonymizedIPAddress", "Anonymous IP Usage",
            RiskEventTypes has "maliciousIPAddress", "Malicious IP Access",
            RiskEventTypes has "unfamiliarFeatures", "Unfamiliar Location",
            RiskEventTypes has "impossibleTravel", "Impossible Travel",
            RiskEventTypes has "malwareInfectedIPAddress", "Malware-Infected Source",
            "Unknown Risk Pattern"
        ),
        RiskLevel = case(
            RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "high", "Critical",
            RiskLevelAggregated == "high", "High",
            "Medium"
        ),
        UserPrincipal = UserPrincipalName,
        Details = strcat("App: ", AppDisplayName, ", Location: ", Location, ", IP: ", IPAddress)
    | project TimeGenerated, Source, RiskType, RiskLevel, UserPrincipal, Details
    ),
    (
    // Defender XDR - Suspicious file downloads
    DeviceFileEvents
    | where TimeGenerated > t0
    | where FileName has_any (".h5", ".pkl", ".pt", ".onnx", "model", "training", "dataset")
    | where ActionType has_any ("FileCreated", "FileModified", "FileRenamed")
    | where FolderPath has_any ("Downloads", "Temp", "USB", "OneDrive", "Removable")
    | extend
        Source = "Defender XDR",
        RiskType = case(
            FolderPath has "USB" or FolderPath has "Removable", "AI Model to Removable Media",
            FolderPath has "Temp", "AI Model to Temp Folder",
            FolderPath has "Downloads", "AI Model Download",
            "Suspicious File Activity"
        ),
        RiskLevel = case(
            FolderPath has_any ("USB", "Removable"), "Critical",
            FileName has_any (".h5", ".pkl", ".pt"), "High",
            "Medium"
        ),
        UserPrincipal = InitiatingProcessAccountName,
        Details = strcat("File: ", FileName, ", Path: ", FolderPath, ", Device: ", DeviceName)
    | project TimeGenerated, Source, RiskType, RiskLevel, UserPrincipal, Details
    )
| summarize
    RiskEventCount = count(),
    CriticalCount = countif(RiskLevel == "Critical"),
    HighCount = countif(RiskLevel == "High"),
    MediumCount = countif(RiskLevel == "Medium"),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserPrincipal),
    UserList = make_set(UserPrincipal, 5),
    SampleDetails = make_set(Details, 2),
    FirstEvent = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastEvent = max(TimeGenerated)
  by Source, RiskType, RiskLevel
| extend
    ThreatScore = (CriticalCount * 5) + (HighCount * 3) + (MediumCount * 2)
| extend
    InsiderThreatLevel = case(
        ThreatScore >= 20, " Critical Insider Threat",
        ThreatScore >= 10, " High Insider Risk",
        ThreatScore >= 5, " Medium Insider Risk",
        " Low Risk"
    )
| project
    ['Insider Threat Level'] = InsiderThreatLevel,
    ['Detection Source'] = Source,
    ['Risk Type'] = RiskType,
    ['Severity'] = RiskLevel,
    ['Threat Score'] = ThreatScore,
    ['Total Events'] = RiskEventCount,
    ['Critical Events'] = CriticalCount,
    ['High-Risk Events'] = HighCount,
    ['Medium-Risk Events'] = MediumCount,
    ['Unique Users'] = UniqueUsers,
    ['Users Involved'] = tostring(UserList),
    ['Event Examples'] = tostring(SampleDetails),
    ['First Detection'] = format_datetime(FirstEvent, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Last Detection'] = format_datetime(LastEvent, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Threat Score'] desc, ['Total Events'] desc
content.title: 🚨 Insider Risk Management - AI Data Abuse & Exfiltration Detection

content.json:
🌍 Global AI Security Geo Analytics

Author: Jason Liang

> **Value Proposition**: Visualize the global distribution of AI security threats to surface hot zones, threat origins, and cross-border attack patterns. Enable the security team to understand worldwide AI risk posture, identify geopolitical exposure, and build location-aware defenses.

🗺️ Threat Map

Visualize global AI threat distribution to pinpoint high-risk regions and origins

🌐 Cross-Border Analysis

Analyze multinational threat correlations and geopolitical risk

---

content.query:
// Global heatmap of AI threats
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where AlertName has_any ("Model", "Prompt", "AI", "Copilot", "Jailbreak")
| extend Entities = parse_json(Entities)
| mv-expand Entity = Entities
| extend 
    Country = tostring(Entity.Location.CountryName),
    CountryCode = tostring(Entity.Location.CountryCode)
| where isnotempty(Country) and Country != "Unknown"
| summarize 
    ThreatCount = count(),
    HighSeverityCount = countif(AlertSeverity == "High"),
    UniqueAlertTypes = dcount(AlertName),
    LastThreat = max(TimeGenerated)
  by Country, CountryCode
| extend 
    ThreatLevel = case(
        HighSeverityCount >= 20, "🔥 Extreme Threat",
        HighSeverityCount >= 10, "🔴 High Threat",
        HighSeverityCount >= 5, "🟠 Moderate Threat",
        "🟡 Low Threat"
    ),
    CountryWithFlag = case(
        Country has "United States" or CountryCode == "US", "🇺🇸 United States",
        Country has "China" or CountryCode == "CN", "🇨🇳 China",
        Country has "Russia" or CountryCode == "RU", "🇷🇺 Russia",
        Country has "Japan" or CountryCode == "JP", "🇯🇵 Japan",
        Country has "United Kingdom" or CountryCode == "GB", "🇬🇧 United Kingdom",
        Country has "Germany" or CountryCode == "DE", "🇩🇪 Germany",
        Country has "France" or CountryCode == "FR", "🇫🇷 France",
        Country has "India" or CountryCode == "IN", "🇮🇳 India",
        Country has "South Korea" or CountryCode == "KR", "🇰🇷 South Korea",
        Country has "Australia" or CountryCode == "AU", "🇦🇺 Australia",
        Country has "Canada" or CountryCode == "CA", "🇨🇦 Canada",
        Country has "Brazil" or CountryCode == "BR", "🇧🇷 Brazil",
        Country has "Italy" or CountryCode == "IT", "🇮🇹 Italy",
        Country has "Spain" or CountryCode == "ES", "🇪🇸 Spain",
        Country has "Netherlands" or CountryCode == "NL", "🇳🇱 Netherlands",
        Country has "Singapore" or CountryCode == "SG", "🇸🇬 Singapore",
        Country has "Mexico" or CountryCode == "MX", "🇲🇽 Mexico",
        Country has "Israel" or CountryCode == "IL", "🇮🇱 Israel",
        strcat("🌍 ", Country)
    )
| project 
    Country,
    ['Threat Count'] = ThreatCount,
    ['High-Severity Threats'] = HighSeverityCount,
    ['Threat Type Count'] = UniqueAlertTypes,
    ['Threat Level'] = ThreatLevel,
    ['Latest Threat'] = format_datetime(LastThreat, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Threat Count'] desc
content.title: 🗺️ Global AI Threat Heatmap

content.query:
// Global distribution of AI application usage
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where isnotempty(AppDisplayName) and isnotempty(Location)
| extend AppNameLower = tolower(AppDisplayName)
| where AppNameLower has_any ("chat", "copilot", "ai", "gpt")
| extend 
    CountryCode = Location,
    Country = case(
        Location == "US", "United States",
        Location == "CN", "China",
        Location == "JP", "Japan",
        Location == "SG", "Singapore",
        Location == "GB", "United Kingdom",
        Location == "DE", "Germany",
        Location == "FR", "France",
        Location == "IN", "India",
        Location == "KR", "South Korea",
        Location == "AU", "Australia",
        Location == "CA", "Canada",
        Location == "BR", "Brazil",
        Location == "RU", "Russia",
        Location == "IT", "Italy",
        Location == "ES", "Spain",
        Location == "NL", "Netherlands",
        Location == "SE", "Sweden",

        Country == "China" or CountryCode == "CN", "🇨🇳 China",
        Country == "Japan" or CountryCode == "JP", "🇯🇵 Japan",
        Country == "Singapore" or CountryCode == "SG", "🇸🇬 Singapore",
        Country == "United Kingdom" or CountryCode == "GB", "🇬🇧 United Kingdom",
        Country == "Germany" or CountryCode == "DE", "🇩🇪 Germany",
        Country == "France" or CountryCode == "FR", "🇫🇷 France",
        Country == "India" or CountryCode == "IN", "🇮🇳 India",
        Country == "South Korea" or CountryCode == "KR", "🇰🇷 South Korea",
        Country == "Australia" or CountryCode == "AU", "🇦🇺 Australia",
        Country == "Canada" or CountryCode == "CA", "🇨🇦 Canada",
        Country == "Brazil" or CountryCode == "BR", "🇧🇷 Brazil",
        Country == "Russia" or CountryCode == "RU", "🇷🇺 Russia",
        Country == "Italy" or CountryCode == "IT", "🇮🇹 Italy",
        Country == "Spain" or CountryCode == "ES", "🇪🇸 Spain",
        Country == "Netherlands" or CountryCode == "NL", "🇳🇱 Netherlands",
        Country == "Sweden" or CountryCode == "SE", "🇸🇪 Sweden",
        Country == "Norway" or CountryCode == "NO", "🇳🇴 Norway",
        Country == "Denmark" or CountryCode == "DK", "🇩🇰 Denmark",
        Country == "Finland" or CountryCode == "FI", "🇫🇮 Finland",
        strcat("🌍 ", Country)
    )
| project

    ['User Count'] = UniqueUsers,

content.title: 📍 Global AI Application Usage Distribution

content.query:
// Threat versus usage comparison analysis
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where AlertName has_any ("Model", "Prompt", "AI", "Copilot")
| extend 
    // Extract country information from multiple fields
    ExtractedCountry = coalesce(
        tostring(parse_json(tostring(Entities))[0].Location.CountryName),
        tostring(parse_json(tostring(Entities))[0].Location.Country),
        extract(@"Country[:\s]*([A-Za-z\s]+)", 1, tostring(Entities)),
        extract(@"CountryName[:\s]*([A-Za-z\s]+)", 1, tostring(Entities)),
        "Unknown"
    )
| where ExtractedCountry != "Unknown" and isnotempty(ExtractedCountry)
| extend Country = case(
    ExtractedCountry has "United States" or ExtractedCountry == "US", "United States",
    ExtractedCountry has "China" or ExtractedCountry == "CN", "China",
    ExtractedCountry has "Japan" or ExtractedCountry == "JP", "Japan",
    ExtractedCountry has "Singapore" or ExtractedCountry == "SG", "Singapore",
    ExtractedCountry has "United Kingdom" or ExtractedCountry == "GB" or ExtractedCountry == "UK", "United Kingdom",
    ExtractedCountry has "Germany" or ExtractedCountry == "DE", "Germany",
    ExtractedCountry has "France" or ExtractedCountry == "FR", "France",
    ExtractedCountry has "India" or ExtractedCountry == "IN", "India",
    ExtractedCountry has "Korea" or ExtractedCountry == "KR", "South Korea",
    ExtractedCountry has "Australia" or ExtractedCountry == "AU", "Australia",
    ExtractedCountry has "Canada" or ExtractedCountry == "CA", "Canada",
    ExtractedCountry has "Brazil" or ExtractedCountry == "BR", "Brazil",
    ExtractedCountry has "Russia" or ExtractedCountry == "RU", "Russia",
    ExtractedCountry has "Italy" or ExtractedCountry == "IT", "Italy",
    ExtractedCountry has "Spain" or ExtractedCountry == "ES", "Spain",
    ExtractedCountry has "Netherlands" or ExtractedCountry == "NL", "Netherlands",
    ExtractedCountry has "Sweden" or ExtractedCountry == "SE", "Sweden",
    ExtractedCountry has "Norway" or ExtractedCountry == "NO", "Norway",
    ExtractedCountry has "Denmark" or ExtractedCountry == "DK", "Denmark",
    ExtractedCountry has "Finland" or ExtractedCountry == "FI", "Finland",
    ExtractedCountry
)
| summarize ThreatCount = count() by Country
| join kind=fullouter (
    SigninLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
    | where isnotempty(AppDisplayName) and isnotempty(Location)
    | extend AppNameLower = tolower(AppDisplayName)
    | where AppNameLower has_any ("chat", "copilot", "ai", "gpt")
    | extend Country = case(
        Location == "US", "United States",
        Location == "CN", "China",
        Location == "JP", "Japan",
        Location == "SG", "Singapore",
        Location == "GB" or Location == "UK", "United Kingdom",
        Location == "DE", "Germany",
        Location == "FR", "France",
        Location == "IN", "India",
        Location == "KR", "South Korea",
        Location == "AU", "Australia",
        Location == "CA", "Canada",
        Location == "BR", "Brazil",
        Location == "RU", "Russia",
        Location == "IT", "Italy",
        Location == "ES", "Spain",
        Location == "NL", "Netherlands",
        Location == "SE", "Sweden",
        Location == "NO", "Norway",
        Location == "DK", "Denmark",
        Location == "FI", "Finland",
        Location
    )
    | where isnotempty(Country) and Country != ""
    | summarize UsageCount = count() by Country
) on Country
| extend 
    FinalCountry = coalesce(Country, Country1),
    FinalThreatCount = coalesce(ThreatCount, 0),
    FinalUsageCount = coalesce(UsageCount, 0)
| where isnotempty(FinalCountry) and FinalCountry != ""
| extend 
    RiskRatio = round(todouble(FinalThreatCount) / todouble(FinalUsageCount + 1) * 100, 2),
    RiskLevel = case(
        FinalThreatCount > 0 and FinalUsageCount == 0, "🔥 Threat-Only Origin",
        round(todouble(FinalThreatCount) / todouble(FinalUsageCount + 1) * 100, 2) >= 10, "🔴 Extreme Risk",
        round(todouble(FinalThreatCount) / todouble(FinalUsageCount + 1) * 100, 2) >= 5, "🟠 High Risk",
        round(todouble(FinalThreatCount) / todouble(FinalUsageCount + 1) * 100, 2) >= 2, "🟡 Moderate Risk",
        FinalUsageCount > 0, "🟢 Low Risk",
        "⚪ No Data"
    )
| order by FinalThreatCount desc, RiskRatio desc
| project 
    ['Country'] = FinalCountry,
    ['Threat Events'] = FinalThreatCount,
    ['AI Usage Count'] = FinalUsageCount,
    ['Risk Ratio'] = strcat(tostring(RiskRatio), "%"),
    ['Risk Level'] = RiskLevel
| take 25

// Cross-border AI threat correlation analysis
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where AlertName has_any ("Model", "Prompt", "AI", "Copilot")
| extend 
    // Extract source country information from multiple fields
    ExtractedSourceCountry = coalesce(
        tostring(parse_json(tostring(Entities))[0].Location.CountryName),
        tostring(parse_json(tostring(Entities))[0].Location.Country),
        tostring(parse_json(tostring(ExtendedProperties))["SourceCountry"]),
        tostring(parse_json(tostring(ExtendedProperties))["Country"]),
        extract(@"Country[:\s]*([A-Za-z\s]+)", 1, tostring(Description)),
        extract(@"from\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)", 1, tostring(Description)),
        "Unknown"
    ),
    // Normalize target entity details
    CleanTargetEntity = coalesce(
        tostring(CompromisedEntity),
        tostring(parse_json(tostring(Entities))[0].Name),
        tostring(parse_json(tostring(ExtendedProperties))["TargetResource"]),
        "Unknown Target"
    )
| where ExtractedSourceCountry != "Unknown" and isnotempty(ExtractedSourceCountry)
| where CleanTargetEntity != "Unknown Target" and isnotempty(CleanTargetEntity)
| extend 
    SourceCountry = case(
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "United States" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "US", "🇺🇸 United States",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "China" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "CN", "🇨🇳 China",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "Russia" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "RU", "🇷🇺 Russia",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "Iran" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "IR", "🇮🇷 Iran",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "North Korea" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "KP", "🇰🇵 North Korea",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "Germany" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "DE", "🇩🇪 Germany",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "France" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "FR", "🇫🇷 France",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "United Kingdom" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "GB", "🇬🇧 United Kingdom",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "Japan" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "JP", "🇯🇵 Japan",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "India" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "IN", "🇮🇳 India",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "Brazil" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "BR", "🇧🇷 Brazil",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "Australia" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "AU", "🇦🇺 Australia",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "Canada" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "CA", "🇨🇦 Canada",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "South Korea" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "KR", "🇰🇷 South Korea",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "Israel" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "IL", "🇮🇱 Israel",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "Netherlands" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "NL", "🇳🇱 Netherlands",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "Spain" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "ES", "🇪🇸 Spain",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "Italy" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "IT", "🇮🇹 Italy",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "Mexico" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "MX", "🇲🇽 Mexico",
        ExtractedSourceCountry has "Singapore" or ExtractedSourceCountry == "SG", "🇸🇬 Singapore",
        strcat("🌍 ", ExtractedSourceCountry)
    )
| summarize 
    AttackCount = count(),
    UniqueTargets = dcount(CleanTargetEntity),
    HighSeverityAttacks = countif(AlertSeverity == "High"),
    AttackMethods = make_set(AlertName, 5),
    TargetTypes = make_set(CleanTargetEntity, 5),
    FirstAttack = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastAttack = max(TimeGenerated)
  by SourceCountry
| extend 
    AttackIntensity = round(todouble(AttackCount) / todouble(datetime_diff('day', LastAttack, FirstAttack) + 1), 2),
    ThreatLevel = case(
        HighSeverityAttacks >= 20, "🔥 Nation-State Critical Threat",
        HighSeverityAttacks >= 10 or AttackCount >= 50, "🔴 Advanced Persistent Threat",
        HighSeverityAttacks >= 5 or AttackCount >= 20, "🟠 Elevated Threat",
        AttackCount >= 10, "🟡 Low-Level Threat",
        "🟢 Sporadic Activity"
    )
| project 
    ['Source Country'] = SourceCountry,
    ['Threat Level'] = ThreatLevel,
    ['Total Attacks'] = AttackCount,
    ['High-Severity Attacks'] = HighSeverityAttacks,
    ['Target Count'] = UniqueTargets,
    ['Attack Intensity/Day'] = AttackIntensity,
    ['First Attack'] = format_datetime(FirstAttack, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Latest Attack'] = format_datetime(LastAttack, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Attack Methods'] = tostring(AttackMethods),
    ['Target Types'] = tostring(TargetTypes)
| order by ['Total Attacks'] desc, ['High-Severity Attacks'] desc
| take 20
content.title: 🌐 Cross-Border AI Threat Correlation Analysis

content.json:
🔐 AI API Security Monitoring

Author: Jason Liang

> **Value Proposition**: Focus on AI API security monitoring and anomaly detection by analyzing invocation patterns, surfacing abnormal behaviors, and tracking threat events. Help the security team safeguard AI service endpoints against misuse, DDoS attacks, and malicious calls.

🔍 Anomaly Detection

Monitor AI API anomalies in real time to identify malicious traffic and attack patterns

⚡ Performance Monitoring

Track API response time, error rate, and availability health

---

content.query:
// AI API anomaly detection analysis (SecurityAlert-based)
let aiApiKeywords = dynamic(["openai", "chat", "copilot", "ai", "gpt", "completions", "embeddings"]);

SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where AlertName has_any (aiApiKeywords) or Description has_any (aiApiKeywords)
| extend 
    Hour = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h),
    IsHighSeverity = iff(AlertSeverity == "High", 1, 0),
    IsMediumSeverity = iff(AlertSeverity == "Medium", 1, 0),
    IsAPIThreat = iff(AlertName has_any ("API", "Endpoint", "Request", "Response"), 1, 0)
| summarize 
    HourlyAlertCount = count(),
    HighSeverityCount = sum(IsHighSeverity),
    MediumSeverityCount = sum(IsMediumSeverity),
    APIThreatCount = sum(IsAPIThreat),
    UniqueAlertTypes = dcount(AlertName),
    AffectedEntities = dcount(CompromisedEntity)
  by Hour
| extend 
    SeverityRate = round(todouble(HighSeverityCount) / todouble(HourlyAlertCount) * 100, 2),
    BaselineAlerts = 5.0,
    BaselineSeverityRate = 20.0
| extend 
    VolumeAnomaly = case(
        HourlyAlertCount > BaselineAlerts * 3, "🔴 Alert Spike",
        HourlyAlertCount < BaselineAlerts * 0.3 and HourlyAlertCount > 0, "🟡 Alert Drop",
        HourlyAlertCount > 0, "🟢 Normal",
        "⚪ No Alerts"
    ),
    SeverityAnomaly = case(
        SeverityRate > BaselineSeverityRate * 2, "🔴 High-Severity Anomaly",
        SeverityRate > 0, "🟢 Normal",
        "⚪ No High-Severity Alerts"
    ),
    ThreatActivity = case(
        APIThreatCount > 0, "🔴 Active API Threat",
        "🟢 Normal"
    )
| extend 
    OverallRisk = case(
        VolumeAnomaly has "Spike" or SeverityAnomaly has "Anomaly" or ThreatActivity has "Threat", "🔴 High Risk",
        VolumeAnomaly has "Drop", "🟡 Needs Attention",
        HourlyAlertCount > 0, "🟢 Normal Monitoring",
        "⚪ Quiet Period"
    )
| project 
    ['Time Window'] = format_datetime(Hour, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Risk Level'] = OverallRisk,
    ['Alert Count'] = HourlyAlertCount,
    ['Alert Status'] = VolumeAnomaly,
    ['High-Severity Rate'] = strcat(tostring(SeverityRate), "%"),
    ['Severity Status'] = SeverityAnomaly,
    ['API Threat Activity'] = ThreatActivity,
    ['Alert Type Count'] = UniqueAlertTypes,
    ['Impacted Entities'] = AffectedEntities
| order by ['Time Window'] desc
| take 24
content.title: 🔍 AI API Anomaly Detection - 24-Hour Overview

content.query:
// AI API threat intelligence and attack pattern analysis
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where AlertName has_any ("API", "Injection", "Abuse", "Anomaly", "DDoS", "Brute Force")
| where Description has_any ("AI", "OpenAI", "Cognitive", "API", "model", "completions", "embeddings")
| extend 
    ThreatCategory = case(
        AlertName has "Injection" or Description has "injection", "💉 API Injection Attack",
        AlertName has "Brute Force" or AlertName has "brute", "🔨 Brute Force",
        AlertName has "DDoS" or AlertName has "flood", "💥 DDoS Attack",
        AlertName has "Anomaly" or AlertName has "unusual", "🔍 Anomalous Behavior",
        AlertName has "Abuse" or AlertName has "misuse", "🔌 API Abuse",
        "⚠️ Other Threats"
    ),
    SeverityLevel = case(
        AlertSeverity == "High", "🔴 High",
        AlertSeverity == "Medium", "🟠 Medium",
        AlertSeverity == "Low", "🟡 Low",
        "ℹ️ Informational"
    ),
    TargetAPI = case(
        CompromisedEntity has "completions" or Description has "completions", "Text Completion API",
        CompromisedEntity has "chat" or Description has "chat", "Chat Completion API",
        CompromisedEntity has "embeddings" or Description has "embeddings", "Embedding API",
        CompromisedEntity has "openai" or Description has "openai", "OpenAI API",
        CompromisedEntity has "cognitive" or Description has "cognitive", "Cognitive Services",
        coalesce(CompromisedEntity, "Unknown Target")
    ),
    AttackSource = case(
        Description has "China" or Description has "CN", "🇨🇳 China",
        Description has "Russia" or Description has "RU", "🇷🇺 Russia",
        Description has "Iran" or Description has "IR", "🇮🇷 Iran",
        Description has "North Korea" or Description has "KP", "🇰🇵 North Korea",
        Description has "United States" or Description has "US", "🇺🇸 United States",
        "🌐 Other/Unknown"
    )
| extend 
    CalculatedRiskScore = case(
        AlertSeverity == "High" and ThreatCategory has "Injection", 95,
        AlertSeverity == "High" and ThreatCategory has "DDoS", 90,
        AlertSeverity == "High", 80,
        AlertSeverity == "Medium" and ThreatCategory has "Brute Force", 70,
        AlertSeverity == "Medium", 60,
        AlertSeverity == "Low", 40,
        20
    )
| extend
    ImpactLevel = case(
        CalculatedRiskScore >= 90, "🔥 Severe Impact",
        CalculatedRiskScore >= 70, "🔴 High Impact",
        CalculatedRiskScore >= 50, "🟠 Moderate Impact",
        "🟢 Minor Impact"
    )
| project 
    ['Detected Time'] = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
    ['Threat Category'] = ThreatCategory,
    ['Severity'] = SeverityLevel,
    ['Impact Assessment'] = ImpactLevel,
    ['Risk Score'] = CalculatedRiskScore,
    ['Target API'] = TargetAPI,
    ['Attack Source'] = AttackSource,
    ['Alert Name'] = AlertName,
    ['Impacted Entity'] = CompromisedEntity,
    ['Alert Status'] = Status,
    ['Response Recommendation'] = case(
        ThreatCategory has "Injection", "Immediately review input validation and parameter filtering",
        ThreatCategory has "Brute Force", "Enable IP throttling and account lockout policies",
        ThreatCategory has "DDoS", "Activate DDoS protection and traffic throttling",
        ThreatCategory has "Anomalous Behavior", "Investigate user behavior and invocation patterns",
        ThreatCategory has "API Abuse", "Review API usage policies and quota settings",
        "Follow the standard incident response process"
    )
| order by ['Risk Score'] desc, ['Detected Time'] desc
| take 20
content.title: 🛡️ AI API Threat Intelligence

content.query:
// AI service configuration change monitoring
AuditLogs
| extend TargetResourcesText = tostring(TargetResources), AdditionalDetailsText = tostring(AdditionalDetails)
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where OperationName has_any ('Add', 'Update', 'Delete', 'Modify', 'Create', 'Remove', 'Grant', 'Revoke')
| where TargetResourcesText has_any ('cognitive', 'openai', 'machinelearning', 'bot', 'ai') or
        AdditionalDetailsText has_any ('CognitiveServices', 'OpenAI', 'MachineLearning', 'BotService') or
        Category == 'ApplicationManagement'
| extend
    ResourceName = coalesce(
        tostring(TargetResources[0].displayName),
        tostring(TargetResources[0].userPrincipalName),
        tostring(TargetResources[0].id),
        'Unknown Resource'
    ),
    Actor = coalesce(
        tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName),
        tostring(InitiatedBy.app.displayName),
        tostring(InitiatedBy.app.servicePrincipalName),
        'System Operation'
    ),
    SourceIP = coalesce(
        tostring(InitiatedBy.user.ipAddress),
        tostring(InitiatedBy.app.ipAddress),
        'IP Not Recorded'
    ),
    AIServiceType = case(
        TargetResourcesText has 'cognitive' or AdditionalDetailsText has 'CognitiveServices', '🧠 Cognitive Services',
        TargetResourcesText has 'openai' or AdditionalDetailsText has 'OpenAI', '🤖 Azure OpenAI',
        TargetResourcesText has 'machinelearning' or AdditionalDetailsText has 'MachineLearning', '📊 Machine Learning',
        TargetResourcesText has 'bot' or AdditionalDetailsText has 'BotService', '🤖 Bot Service',
        TargetResourcesText has 'copilot' or AdditionalDetailsText has 'Copilot', '💼 Microsoft Copilot',
        Category == 'ApplicationManagement', '📱 Application Management',
        '⚙️ Other Services'
    ),
    RiskLevel = case(
        OperationName has_any ('Delete', 'Remove', 'Revoke'), '🔴 High-Risk Operation',
        OperationName has_any ('Grant', 'Add') and TargetResourcesText has_any ('admin', 'owner', 'contributor'), '🔴 Privilege Escalation',
        OperationName has_any ('Update', 'Modify') and TargetResourcesText has_any ('key', 'secret', 'credential'), '🟠 Sensitive Change',
        OperationName has_any ('Create', 'Add'), '🟡 Resource Creation',
        '🟢 Routine Operation'
    ),
    ChangeDetails = case(
        OperationName has 'Add', strcat('Added: ', tostring(TargetResources[0].type)),
        OperationName has 'Delete', strcat('Deleted: ', tostring(TargetResources[0].type)),
        OperationName has 'Grant', strcat('Permission Action: ', OperationName),
        strcat('Operation: ', OperationName)
    ),
    OriginalTime = TimeGenerated
| project
    ['Timestamp'] = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
    ['AI Service Type'] = AIServiceType,
    ['Resource Name'] = ResourceName,
    ['Operation Type'] = OperationName,
    ['Risk Level'] = RiskLevel,
    ['Actor'] = Actor,
    ['Source IP Address'] = SourceIP,
    ['Change Details'] = ChangeDetails,
    ['Operation Result'] = Result,
    OriginalTime
| order by OriginalTime desc
| project-away OriginalTime
| take 30

]);

    ['Rate Limit Hits'] = RateLimited,
