content.query:
// AI API performance and reliability monitoring (final version)
let aiApiEndpoints = dynamic([
    "openai.azure.com", "api.openai.com", "cognitive.microsoft.com",
    "/chat/completions", "/completions", "/embeddings", "/models",
    "copilot", "ai-studio", "machinelearning", "cognitiveservices"
]);

// Performance monitoring based on AppServiceHTTPLogs
AppServiceHTTPLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where CsHost has_any (aiApiEndpoints) or CsUriStem has_any (aiApiEndpoints)
| extend 
    APIEndpoint = case(
        CsUriStem has "/chat/completions", "💬 Chat Completions",
        CsUriStem has "/completions", "📝 Text Completions", 
        CsUriStem has "/embeddings", "🔢 Embeddings",
        CsUriStem has "/models", "🤖 Models",
        CsHost has "openai.azure.com", "☁️ Azure OpenAI",
        CsHost has "api.openai.com", "🌐 OpenAI API",
        CsHost has "cognitive.microsoft.com", "🧠 Cognitive Services",
        "⚙️ Other AI APIs"
    ),
    ResponseCategory = case(
        ScStatus < 300, "✅ Successful Response",
        ScStatus == 401, "🔒 Authentication Failed",
        ScStatus == 403, "🚫 Authorization Failed",
        ScStatus == 429, "⏱️ Rate Limit Triggered",
        ScStatus == 500, "❌ Server Error",
        ScStatus == 502, "🚧 Gateway Error",
        ScStatus == 503, "⚠️ Service Unavailable",
        ScStatus == 504, "⏰ Gateway Timeout",
        ScStatus < 500, "⚠️ Client Error",
        "❌ Server Error"
    ),
    PerformanceCategory = case(
        TimeTaken <= 1000, "🟢 Excellent (<1s)",
        TimeTaken <= 3000, "🟡 Good (1-3s)",
        TimeTaken <= 10000, "🟠 Fair (3-10s)",
        TimeTaken <= 30000, "🔴 Slow (10-30s)",
        "🔥 Very Slow (>30s)"
    ),
    HourlyBucket = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| summarize 
    RequestCount = count(),
    SuccessCount = countif(ScStatus < 300),
    ClientErrorCount = countif(ScStatus >= 400 and ScStatus < 500),
    ServerErrorCount = countif(ScStatus >= 500),
    AuthErrorCount = countif(ScStatus == 401 or ScStatus == 403),
    RateLimitCount = countif(ScStatus == 429),
    AvgResponseTime = round(avg(TimeTaken), 0),
    P50ResponseTime = round(percentile(TimeTaken, 50), 0),
    P95ResponseTime = round(percentile(TimeTaken, 95), 0),
    P99ResponseTime = round(percentile(TimeTaken, 99), 0),
    MaxResponseTime = round(max(TimeTaken), 0),
    UniqueClients = dcount(CIp),
    TotalBandwidth = round(sum(CsBytes) / 1024.0 / 1024.0, 2)
  by APIEndpoint, HourlyBucket
| extend 
    SuccessRate = round(todouble(SuccessCount) / todouble(RequestCount) * 100, 2),
    ErrorRate = round(todouble(ClientErrorCount + ServerErrorCount) / todouble(RequestCount) * 100, 2),
    PerformanceScore = case(
        AvgResponseTime <= 1000 and SuccessRate >= 99, 95,
        AvgResponseTime <= 3000 and SuccessRate >= 95, 85,
        AvgResponseTime <= 10000 and SuccessRate >= 90, 75,
        AvgResponseTime <= 30000 and SuccessRate >= 80, 65,
        50
    )
| extend
    HealthStatus = case(
        PerformanceScore >= 90, "🟢 Healthy",
        PerformanceScore >= 75, "🟡 Needs Attention",
        PerformanceScore >= 60, "🟠 Warning",
        "🔴 Critical"
    ),
    Availability = case(
        SuccessRate >= 99.9, "🟢 Excellent (99.9%+)",
        SuccessRate >= 99.5, "🟡 Good (99.5%+)",
        SuccessRate >= 99.0, "🟠 Fair (99.0%+)",
        "🔴 Poor (<99%)"
    )
| project 
    ['API Endpoint'] = APIEndpoint,
    ['Time Window'] = format_datetime(HourlyBucket, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Health Status'] = HealthStatus,
    ['Availability'] = Availability,
    ['Performance Score'] = PerformanceScore,
    ['Total Requests'] = RequestCount,
    ['Success Rate %'] = SuccessRate,
    ['Error Rate %'] = ErrorRate,
    ['Authentication Errors'] = AuthErrorCount,
    ['Rate Limit Hits'] = RateLimitCount,
    ['Average Response Time'] = AvgResponseTime,
    ['P95 Response Time'] = P95ResponseTime,
    ['P99 Response Time'] = P99ResponseTime,
    ['Max Response Time'] = MaxResponseTime,
    ['Unique Clients'] = UniqueClients,
    ['Bandwidth (MB)'] = TotalBandwidth
| order by ['Time Window'] desc, ['Total Requests'] desc
| take 50

content.json:
🎯 Deep User Behavior Analysis

Author: Jason Liang

> **Value Statement**: This view examines user behavior patterns for AI application usage. Machine learning highlights anomalous sessions, flags High-Risk Users, and visualizes access trends so security teams can baseline behavior, detect insider threats, and strengthen account safeguards.

💡 Behavior Insights

Profile Typical User journeys across AI applications to establish behavioral baselines.

🔍 Anomaly Detection

Apply machine learning to surface unusual access patterns and suspicious user actions.

---

content.query:
// User AI application access behavior analysis (revised)
let allAIApps = dynamic([
    "chat", "copilot", "ai", "gpt", "claude", "bard", "gemini", 
    "chatgpt", "openai", "anthropic", "perplexity", "character.ai",
    "replika", "jasper", "writesonic", "copy.ai", "notion ai",
    "grammarly", "bing chat", "you.com", "poe", "huggingface",
    "microsoft copilot", "github copilot", "azure openai", "bing chat enterprise",
    "google bard", "amazon codewhisperer", "tabnine", "codeium",
    "chatbot", "conversational ai", "llm", "language model"
]);

let userEntraData = IdentityInfo
| project 
    UPN = tostring(AccountUPN),
    Department = tostring(Department),
    JobTitle = tostring(JobTitle),
    Manager = tostring(Manager)
| where isnotempty(UPN);

SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where isnotempty(UserPrincipalName) and isnotempty(AppDisplayName)
| extend AppNameLower = tolower(AppDisplayName)
| where AppNameLower has_any (allAIApps)
| extend 
    SessionHour = datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated),
    SessionDayOfWeek = dayofweek(TimeGenerated)
| extend
    IsWeekend = (SessionDayOfWeek == 0 or SessionDayOfWeek == 6),
    IsAfterHours = (SessionHour < 8 or SessionHour > 18)
| extend
    DeviceOS = tostring(parse_json(tostring(DeviceDetail)).operatingSystem),
    Browser = tostring(parse_json(tostring(DeviceDetail)).browser)
| extend
    // Unified device categorization
    DeviceCategory = case(
        // Unified Windows category (all versions) - comprehensive matching to catch Windows 10, Windows 11, etc.
        DeviceOS has "Windows" or DeviceOS has "windows" or DeviceOS has "WINDOWS" or
        DeviceOS has "Win32" or DeviceOS has "win32" or DeviceOS has "Win64" or DeviceOS has "win64" or
        DeviceOS has "Win10" or DeviceOS has "Win 10" or DeviceOS has "Win11" or DeviceOS has "Win 11" or
        DeviceOS has "Win7" or DeviceOS has "Win 7" or DeviceOS has "Win8" or DeviceOS has "Win 8" or
        DeviceOS has "NT" or DeviceOS has "Microsoft Windows" or
        DeviceOS startswith "Win" or DeviceOS startswith "win", "Windows",
        DeviceOS has "macOS" or DeviceOS has "Mac OS" or DeviceOS has "OSX" or DeviceOS has "OS X" or DeviceOS has "Darwin", "macOS",
        DeviceOS has "iOS" or DeviceOS has "iPhone" or DeviceOS has "iPad", "iOS",
        DeviceOS has "Android", "Android",
        DeviceOS has "Linux" or DeviceOS has "Ubuntu" or DeviceOS has "CentOS" or DeviceOS has "RedHat" or DeviceOS has "Debian" or DeviceOS has "SUSE", "Linux",
        DeviceOS has "Chrome OS" or DeviceOS has "ChromeOS", "Chrome OS",
        isnotempty(DeviceOS), DeviceOS,
        "Unknown"
    ),
    ExtractedDept = extract(@"@([^.]+)\.", 1, UserPrincipalName)
| join kind=leftouter (userEntraData) on $left.UserPrincipalName == $right.UPN
| summarize 
    TotalSessions = count(),
    UniqueApps = dcount(AppDisplayName),
    WeekendSessions = countif(IsWeekend),
    AfterHoursSessions = countif(IsAfterHours),
    UniqueDevices = dcount(DeviceCategory),
    UniqueLocations = dcount(Location),
    FirstAccess = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastAccess = max(TimeGenerated),
    TopApps = make_set(AppDisplayName, 3)
  by UserPrincipalName, Department, JobTitle, Manager, ExtractedDept
| extend 
    FinalDepartment = coalesce(Department, ExtractedDept, "Unknown"),
    BehaviorScore = case(
        AfterHoursSessions > TotalSessions * 0.5, 3,
        WeekendSessions > TotalSessions * 0.3, 2,
        UniqueLocations > 5, 2,
        1
    )
| extend
    RiskProfile = case(
        BehaviorScore >= 3, "🔴 High-Risk User",
        BehaviorScore >= 2, "🟠 Moderate Risk",
        "🟢 Typical User"
    ),
    UsagePattern = case(
        TotalSessions >= 100, "🔥 Heavy User",
        TotalSessions >= 50, "🔴 Active User",
        TotalSessions >= 20, "🟡 Regular User",
        "🟢 Light User"
    )
| project 
    ['User'] = UserPrincipalName,
    ['Department'] = FinalDepartment,
    ['Job Title'] = coalesce(JobTitle, "Unknown"),
    ['Usage Pattern'] = UsagePattern,
    ['Risk Level'] = RiskProfile,
    ['Total Sessions'] = TotalSessions,
    ['Application Count'] = UniqueApps,
    ['Weekend Sessions'] = WeekendSessions,
    ['After-hours Sessions'] = AfterHoursSessions,
    ['Device Count'] = UniqueDevices,
    ['Location Count'] = UniqueLocations,
    ['First Access'] = format_datetime(FirstAccess, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Last Access'] = format_datetime(LastAccess, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Top Applications'] = tostring(TopApps)
| order by ['Total Sessions'] desc
| take 50

content.query:
// AI usage time pattern analysis
let allAIApps = dynamic(["chat", "copilot", "ai", "gpt", "claude", "bard"]);

SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where isnotempty(UserPrincipalName) and isnotempty(AppDisplayName)
| extend AppNameLower = tolower(AppDisplayName)
| where AppNameLower has_any (allAIApps)
| extend 
    Hour = datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated),
    DayOfWeek = dayofweek(TimeGenerated)
| extend
    DayName = case(
        DayOfWeek == 0, "📅 Sunday",
        DayOfWeek == 1, "📅 Monday",
        DayOfWeek == 2, "📅 Tuesday",
        DayOfWeek == 3, "📅 Wednesday",
        DayOfWeek == 4, "📅 Thursday",
        DayOfWeek == 5, "📅 Friday",
        "📅 Saturday"
    ),
    TimeSlot = case(
        Hour >= 0 and Hour < 6, "🌙 Late Night (0-6)",
        Hour >= 6 and Hour < 9, "🌅 Early Morning (6-9)",
        Hour >= 9 and Hour < 12, "☀️ Morning (9-12)",
        Hour >= 12 and Hour < 14, "🍽️ Lunch (12-14)",
        Hour >= 14 and Hour < 18, "🌤️ Afternoon (14-18)",
        Hour >= 18 and Hour < 22, "🌆 Evening (18-22)",
        "🌃 Late Evening (22-24)"
    )
| summarize 
    SessionCount = count(),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserPrincipalName)
  by DayName, TimeSlot
| project 
    ['Day'] = DayName,
    ['Time Slot'] = TimeSlot,

content.query:
// AI application browser and operating system distribution analysis (revised)
let allAIApps = dynamic(["chat", "copilot", "ai", "gpt", "claude", "bard"]);

SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where isnotempty(UserPrincipalName) and isnotempty(AppDisplayName)
| extend AppNameLower = tolower(AppDisplayName)
| where AppNameLower has_any (allAIApps)
| extend 
    DeviceOS = tostring(parse_json(tostring(DeviceDetail)).operatingSystem),
    Browser = tostring(parse_json(tostring(DeviceDetail)).browser)
| extend
    // Unified device categorization - Windows as one category
    DeviceCategory = case(
        // Unified Windows category (all versions) - comprehensive matching to catch Windows 10, Windows 11, etc.
        DeviceOS has "Windows" or DeviceOS has "windows" or DeviceOS has "WINDOWS" or
        DeviceOS has "Win32" or DeviceOS has "win32" or DeviceOS has "Win64" or DeviceOS has "win64" or
        DeviceOS has "Win10" or DeviceOS has "Win 10" or DeviceOS has "Win11" or DeviceOS has "Win 11" or
        DeviceOS has "Win7" or DeviceOS has "Win 7" or DeviceOS has "Win8" or DeviceOS has "Win 8" or
        DeviceOS has "NT" or DeviceOS has "Microsoft Windows" or
        DeviceOS startswith "Win" or DeviceOS startswith "win", "💻 Windows",
        // macOS categorization
        DeviceOS has "macOS" or DeviceOS has "Mac OS" or DeviceOS has "OSX" or DeviceOS has "OS X" or DeviceOS has "Darwin", "🍎 macOS",
        // Mobile devices
        DeviceOS has "iOS" or DeviceOS has "iPhone" or DeviceOS has "iPad", "📱 iOS",
        DeviceOS has "Android", "🤖 Android",
        // Linux variants
        DeviceOS has "Linux" or DeviceOS has "Ubuntu" or DeviceOS has "CentOS" or DeviceOS has "RedHat" or DeviceOS has "Debian" or DeviceOS has "SUSE", "🐧 Linux",
        DeviceOS has "Chrome OS" or DeviceOS has "ChromeOS", "🌐 Chrome OS",
        isnotempty(DeviceOS), strcat("❓ ", DeviceOS),
        "❓ Unknown Device"
    ),
    // Optimized browser categorization
    BrowserCategory = case(
        Browser has "Chrome" and not (Browser has "Edge"), "🌐 Chrome",
        Browser has "Firefox", "🦊 Firefox",
        Browser has "Safari" and not (Browser has "Chrome"), "🧭 Safari",
        Browser has "Edge" or Browser has "Microsoft Edge", "🌊 Edge",
        Browser has "Opera", "🎭 Opera",
        Browser has "Internet Explorer" or Browser has "IE", "⚠️ IE",
        isnotempty(Browser), strcat("❓ ", Browser),
        "❓ Unknown Browser"
    ),
    // Enhanced browser version assessment
    BrowserVersion = case(
        Browser has "Chrome", extract(@"Chrome\s?([0-9.]+)", 1, Browser),
        Browser has "Firefox", extract(@"Firefox\s?([0-9.]+)", 1, Browser),
        Browser has "Safari", extract(@"Safari\s?([0-9.]+)", 1, Browser),
        Browser has "Edge" or Browser has "Microsoft Edge", extract(@"(?:Edge|Microsoft Edge)\s?([0-9.]+)", 1, Browser),
        Browser has "Opera", extract(@"Opera\s?([0-9.]+)", 1, Browser),
        "Unknown Version"
    )
| summarize 
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserPrincipalName),
    TotalSessions = count(),
    LastActivity = max(TimeGenerated),
    TopApps = make_set(AppDisplayName, 3)
  by DeviceCategory, BrowserCategory, BrowserVersion
| extend 
    UsageLevel = case(
        TotalSessions >= 100, "🔥 High Usage",
        TotalSessions >= 50, "🟠 Moderate Usage",
        TotalSessions >= 10, "🟡 Low Usage",
        "🟢 Occasional Usage"
    )
| extend
    SecurityRisk = case(
        BrowserVersion == "Unknown Version", "⚪ Version Unknown",
        // Browser version risk assessment
        BrowserCategory == "🌐 Chrome" and toint(split(BrowserVersion, ".")[0]) < 100, "🔴 Chrome Version Outdated",
        BrowserCategory == "🦊 Firefox" and toint(split(BrowserVersion, ".")[0]) < 90, "🔴 Firefox Version Outdated",
        BrowserCategory == "🧭 Safari" and toint(split(BrowserVersion, ".")[0]) < 15, "🔴 Safari Version Outdated",
        BrowserCategory == "🌊 Edge" and toint(split(BrowserVersion, ".")[0]) < 100, "🔴 Edge Version Outdated",
        BrowserCategory == "⚠️ IE", "🔥 Internet Explorer High Risk",
        "🟢 Versions Relatively Secure"
    )
| project 
    ['Device Type'] = DeviceCategory,
    ['Browser Type'] = BrowserCategory,
    ['Browser Version'] = BrowserVersion,
    ['Users'] = UniqueUsers,
    ['Sessions'] = TotalSessions,
    ['Usage Frequency'] = UsageLevel,
    ['Security Risk'] = SecurityRisk,
    ['Last Activity'] = format_datetime(LastActivity, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Top Applications'] = tostring(TopApps)
| order by ['Sessions'] desc
| take 50

// Anomalous behavior detection analysis (final revision)
let allAIApps = dynamic(["chat", "copilot", "ai", "gpt", "claude", "bard"]);

SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where isnotempty(UserPrincipalName) and isnotempty(AppDisplayName)
| extend AppNameLower = tolower(AppDisplayName)
| where AppNameLower has_any (allAIApps)
| extend 
    Hour = datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated),
    DayOfWeek = dayofweek(TimeGenerated)
| extend
    IsWeekend = (DayOfWeek == 0 or DayOfWeek == 6),
    IsNightTime = (Hour >= 22 or Hour <= 5),
    IsEarlyMorning = (Hour >= 6 and Hour <= 8),
    IsBusinessHours = (Hour >= 9 and Hour <= 17 and not(DayOfWeek == 0 or DayOfWeek == 6))
| summarize 
    TotalLogins = count(),
    WeekendLogins = countif(IsWeekend),
    NightLogins = countif(IsNightTime),
    EarlyMorningLogins = countif(IsEarlyMorning),
    BusinessHoursLogins = countif(IsBusinessHours),
    UniqueApps = dcount(AppDisplayName),
    UniqueLocations = dcount(Location),
    FirstLogin = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastLogin = max(TimeGenerated),
    LoginDays = dcount(bin(TimeGenerated, 1d))
  by UserPrincipalName
| project 
    UserPrincipalName,
    TotalLogins,
    WeekendLogins,
    NightLogins,
    EarlyMorningLogins,
    BusinessHoursLogins,
    UniqueApps,
    UniqueLocations,
    FirstLogin,
    LastLogin,
    LoginDays,
    WeekendRatio = round(todouble(WeekendLogins) / todouble(TotalLogins) * 100, 1),
    NightRatio = round(todouble(NightLogins) / todouble(TotalLogins) * 100, 1),
    BusinessHoursRatio = round(todouble(BusinessHoursLogins) / todouble(TotalLogins) * 100, 1)
| extend
    AnomalyScore = case(
        WeekendRatio > 50, 3,
        NightRatio > 30, 3,
        UniqueLocations > 10, 2,
        WeekendRatio > 30 or NightRatio > 20, 2,
        UniqueLocations > 5, 1,
        0
    )
| extend
    BehaviorType = case(
        AnomalyScore >= 3, "🔴 Severe Anomaly",
        AnomalyScore >= 2, "🟠 Moderate Anomaly",
        AnomalyScore >= 1, "🟡 Minor Anomaly",
        "🟢 Normal Behavior"
    )
| where AnomalyScore > 0  // Display only users with anomalies
| project 
    ['User'] = UserPrincipalName,
    ['Behavior Type'] = BehaviorType,
    ['Anomaly Score'] = AnomalyScore,
    ['Total Sign-ins'] = TotalLogins,
    ['Weekend Sign-in Ratio'] = strcat(tostring(WeekendRatio), "%"),
    ['Night Sign-in Ratio'] = strcat(tostring(NightRatio), "%"),
    ['Business Hours Ratio'] = strcat(tostring(BusinessHoursRatio), "%"),
    ['Location Count'] = UniqueLocations,
    ['Applications Used'] = UniqueApps,
    ['Active Days'] = LoginDays,
    ['First Sign-in'] = format_datetime(FirstLogin, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Last Sign-in'] = format_datetime(LastLogin, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Anomaly Score'] desc, ['Total Sign-ins'] desc
| take 30

// Geographic access pattern analysis (revised)
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where isnotempty(UserPrincipalName) and isnotempty(AppDisplayName) and isnotempty(Location)
| extend AppNameLower = tolower(AppDisplayName)
| where AppNameLower has_any ("chat", "copilot", "ai", "gpt", "claude", "bard")
| extend 
    Country = case(
        Location == "US", "🇺🇸 United States",
        Location == "CN", "🇨🇳 China",
        Location == "JP", "🇯🇵 Japan",
        Location == "SG", "🇸🇬 Singapore",
        Location == "GB", "🇬🇧 United Kingdom",
        Location == "DE", "🇩🇪 Germany",
        Location == "FR", "🇫🇷 France",
        Location == "IN", "🇮🇳 India",
        Location == "KR", "🇰🇷 South Korea",
        Location == "AU", "🇦🇺 Australia",
        Location == "CA", "🇨🇦 Canada",
        Location == "BR", "🇧🇷 Brazil",
        Location == "RU", "🇷🇺 Russia",
        Location == "IT", "🇮🇹 Italy",
        Location == "ES", "🇪🇸 Spain",
        Location == "NL", "🇳🇱 Netherlands",
        Location == "SE", "🇸🇪 Sweden",
        Location == "NO", "🇳🇴 Norway",
        Location == "DK", "🇩🇰 Denmark",
        Location == "FI", "🇫🇮 Finland",
        Location
    )
| summarize

    TotalLogins = count(),

  by Country, Location
| extend 
    UsageIntensity = case(
        TotalLogins >= 1000, "🔥 Extremely High Usage",
        TotalLogins >= 500, "🟠 High Usage",
        TotalLogins >= 100, "🟡 Moderate Usage",
        TotalLogins >= 10, "🟢 Low Usage",

    ),

        Location in ("CN", "RU", "IR", "KP"), "🔴 High Security Concern",
        Location in ("US", "GB", "CA", "AU", "DE", "FR", "JP", "SG"), "🟢 Low Security Concern",
        "🟡 Medium Security Concern"
    )
| project 
    ['Country/Region'] = Country,
    ['Location Code'] = Location,
    ['User Count'] = UniqueUsers,
    ['Total Sessions'] = TotalLogins,
    ['Usage Intensity'] = UsageIntensity,
    ['Security Level'] = SecurityConcern,
    ['Application Count'] = UniqueApps,
    ['Last Activity'] = format_datetime(LastActivity, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Total Sessions'] desc
