content.query:
//  Advanced Anomalous Behavior Detection - Insider Risk & XDR
// Multi-source behavioral anomaly detection for AI applications
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
let baselineWindow = 30d;
// Calculate baseline behavior
let userBaseline = SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated between ((t0 - baselineWindow) .. t0)
| extend AppNameLower = tolower(AppDisplayName)
| where AppNameLower has_any ("ai", "copilot", "chat", "gpt", "openai", "azure", "microsoft")
| summarize
    AvgDailySignins = todouble(count()) / 30.0,
    UniqueLocations = todouble(dcount(Location)),
    UniqueIPs = todouble(dcount(IPAddress)),
    UniqueApps = todouble(dcount(AppDisplayName))
  by UserPrincipalName;
// Detect anomalies in current period
let currentBehavior = SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > t0
| extend AppNameLower = tolower(AppDisplayName)
| where AppNameLower has_any ("ai", "copilot", "chat", "gpt", "openai", "azure", "microsoft")
| summarize
    CurrentSignins = todouble(count()),
    CurrentLocations = todouble(dcount(Location)),
    CurrentIPs = todouble(dcount(IPAddress)),
    CurrentApps = todouble(dcount(AppDisplayName)),
    LocationList = make_set(Location, 3),
    IPList = make_set(IPAddress, 3),
    LastActivity = max(TimeGenerated)
  by UserPrincipalName;
// Join and analyze
currentBehavior
| join kind=leftouter (userBaseline) on UserPrincipalName
| extend
    BaselineSignins = coalesce(AvgDailySignins, 1.0),
    BaselineLocations = coalesce(UniqueLocations, 1.0),
    BaselineIPs = coalesce(UniqueIPs, 1.0)
| extend
    SigninAnomaly = (CurrentSignins > (BaselineSignins * 2.0)),
    LocationAnomaly = (CurrentLocations > (BaselineLocations + 1.0)),
    IPAnomaly = (CurrentIPs > (BaselineIPs + 1.0)),
    NewUser = isempty(AvgDailySignins)
| extend
    AnomalyScore = 
        toint(SigninAnomaly) * 3 +
        toint(LocationAnomaly) * 2 +
        toint(IPAnomaly) * 2 +
        toint(NewUser) * 1
| extend
    AnomalyType = case(
        SigninAnomaly and LocationAnomaly, "🔴 Excessive Access + Location Anomaly",
        SigninAnomaly, "🟠 Excessive AI Access",
        LocationAnomaly, "🟡 Unusual Location Access",
        IPAnomaly, "🟠 IP Address Anomaly",
        NewUser, "🟢 New AI User",
        "⚪ Normal Behavior"
    ),
    ThreatLevel = case(
        AnomalyScore >= 5, "🔥 Critical Anomaly",
        AnomalyScore >= 3, "🔴 High Anomaly",
        AnomalyScore >= 2, "🟠 Medium Anomaly",
        "🟡 Low Anomaly"
    )
| project
    ['User'] = UserPrincipalName,
    ['Threat Level'] = ThreatLevel,
    ['Anomaly Type'] = AnomalyType,
    ['Anomaly Score'] = AnomalyScore,
    ['Current Activity Count'] = toint(CurrentSignins),
    ['Baseline Daily Avg'] = round(BaselineSignins, 1),
    ['Locations/Devices'] = strcat_array(LocationList, ", "),
    ['IP Addresses'] = strcat_array(IPList, ", "),
    ['Last Activity'] = format_datetime(LastActivity, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Anomaly Score'] desc, ['Current Activity Count'] desc
| take 50
content.title: 🔍 Advanced Anomalous Behavior Detection - Insider Risk & XDR Integration

content.json:
⏱️ AI Security Time-Correlation Analysis

Author: Jason Liang

> **Value Statement**: This view explores how AI usage aligns with security events over time. By correlating workloads and alerts, security teams can pinpoint attack windows, forecast threat bursts, and understand behavioral triggers to refine monitoring schedules.

🔗 Temporal Association

Analyze temporal correlations between AI activity and security incidents.

📈 Trend Projection

Use historical patterns and machine learning to anticipate upcoming threat activity.

---

content.query:
// AI usage and security event time correlation analysis (revised)
let timeWindow = 1h; // Time window: analyze correlations within one hour

// Retrieve AI usage activity
let aiUsage = SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where AppDisplayName has_any ("AI", "Copilot", "chat", "gpt")
| extend UsageHour = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| summarize 
    UsageCount = count(),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserPrincipalName),
    UsageUsers = make_set(UserPrincipalName, 10)
  by UsageHour
| extend EventType = "💼 AI Usage Activity";

// Retrieve security alerts
let securityEvents = SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where AlertName has_any ("Jailbreak", "Prompt", "AI", "Model")
| extend ThreatHour = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| summarize 
    ThreatCount = count(),
    HighSeverityCount = countif(AlertSeverity == "High"),
    ThreatResources = make_set(CompromisedEntity, 5)
  by ThreatHour
| extend EventType = "🚨 Security Threat";

// Merge analysis
aiUsage
| join kind=fullouter (securityEvents) on $left.UsageHour == $right.ThreatHour
| extend 
    TimeHour = coalesce(UsageHour, ThreatHour),
    UsageCount = coalesce(UsageCount, 0),
    ThreatCount = coalesce(ThreatCount, 0),
    UniqueUsers = coalesce(UniqueUsers, 0),
    HighSeverityCount = coalesce(HighSeverityCount, 0)
| extend 
    CorrelationRisk = case(
        ThreatCount > 0 and UsageCount > 0, "🔴 High-Risk Window",
        ThreatCount > 0, "🟠 Threat Active",
        UsageCount > 0, "🟢 Normal Usage",
        "⚪ No Activity"
    )
| project 
    ['Time Window'] = format_datetime(TimeHour, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Correlation Risk'] = CorrelationRisk,
    ['AI Usage Count'] = UsageCount,
    ['Security Threat Count'] = ThreatCount,
    ['High-Severity Threats'] = HighSeverityCount,
    ['Active Users'] = UniqueUsers
| order by ['Time Window'] desc
| take 50

content.json:
###  Advanced Correlation Analysis
---

content.query:
// User behavior and threat correlation analysis (revised)
// Analyze AI usage patterns for users alongside concurrent security incidents
let suspiciousUsers = SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where AppDisplayName has_any ("AI", "Copilot", "chat", "gpt")
| extend Hour = datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)
| extend IsAfterHours = (Hour < 8 or Hour > 18)
| summarize 
    TotalLogins = count(),
    AfterHoursLogins = countif(IsAfterHours),
    UniqueApps = dcount(AppDisplayName),
    LoginDays = dcount(bin(TimeGenerated, 1d))
  by UserPrincipalName
| extend 
    AfterHoursRatio = round(todouble(AfterHoursLogins) / todouble(TotalLogins) * 100, 1),
    SuspicionScore = case(
        AfterHoursLogins > TotalLogins * 0.5, 3,
        AfterHoursLogins > TotalLogins * 0.3, 2,
        1
    )
| where SuspicionScore >= 2;

// Retrieve threat incidents covering the same days
let threatPeriods = SecurityIncident
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where Title has_any ("Jailbreak", "Prompt", "AI", "Model")
| extend ThreatDay = bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| summarize 
    DailyThreats = count(),
    ThreatDetails = make_set(Title, 3)
  by ThreatDay;

// Correlate usage with threat activity
suspiciousUsers
| join kind=leftouter (
    SigninLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
    | where AppDisplayName has_any ("AI", "Copilot", "chat", "gpt")
    | extend LoginDay = bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
    | summarize by UserPrincipalName, LoginDay
) on UserPrincipalName
| join kind=leftouter (threatPeriods) on $left.LoginDay == $right.ThreatDay
| summarize 
    UserLogins = max(TotalLogins),
    UserAfterHoursRatio = max(AfterHoursRatio),
    UserSuspicionScore = max(SuspicionScore),
    ThreatDays = countif(isnotempty(DailyThreats)),
    TotalThreats = sum(DailyThreats)
  by UserPrincipalName
| extend 
    RiskLevel = case(
        TotalThreats > 0 and UserSuspicionScore >= 3, "🔥 Severe Risk",
        TotalThreats > 0 and UserSuspicionScore >= 2, "🔴 High Risk",
        UserSuspicionScore >= 3, "🟠 Behavioral Anomaly",
        "🟢 Normal User"
    )
| project 
    ['User'] = UserPrincipalName,
    ['Risk Level'] = RiskLevel,
    ['Suspicion Score'] = UserSuspicionScore,
    ['Total Sign-ins'] = UserLogins,
    ['After-hours Ratio'] = strcat(UserAfterHoursRatio, "%"),
    ['Threat-Linked Days'] = ThreatDays,
    ['Linked Threat Count'] = coalesce(TotalThreats, 0)
| order by ['Suspicion Score'] desc, ['Linked Threat Count'] desc
| take 20

// Detailed timeline of threat events
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where AlertName has_any ("Jailbreak", "Prompt", "AI", "Model")
| extend 
    ThreatType = case(
        AlertName has "Jailbreak", "🚨 Jailbreak Attack",
        AlertName has "Prompt", "💉 Prompt Injection",
        AlertName has "Model", "🤖 Model Threat",
        "⚠️ Other Threats"
    ),
    ResourceName = CompromisedEntity,
    Hour = datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)
| project 
    ['Time'] = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
    ['Threat Type'] = ThreatType,
    ['Severity'] = AlertSeverity,
    ['Target Resource'] = ResourceName,
    ['Time Period'] = case(
        Hour >= 0 and Hour < 6, "🌙 Late Night (0-6)",
        Hour >= 6 and Hour < 12, "🌅 Morning (6-12)",
        Hour >= 12 and Hour < 18, "🌤️ Afternoon (12-18)",
        Hour >= 18 and Hour < 24, "🌆 Evening (18-24)",
        "⚪ Unknown Period"
    ),
    ['Alert Name'] = AlertName
| order by ['Time'] desc
| take 30

// AI application usage heatmap: hour versus application family
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > {TimeRange:start}
| where AppDisplayName has_any ("AI", "Copilot", "chat", "gpt")
| extend 
    Hour = datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated),
    AppCategory = case(
        AppDisplayName has "Security Copilot", "Security_Copilot",
        AppDisplayName has "AI Studio", "AI_Studio", 
        AppDisplayName has "GitHub Copilot", "GitHub_Copilot",
        AppDisplayName has "365 Copilot" or AppDisplayName has "M365 Copilot", "M365_Copilot",
        "Other_AI_Apps"
    )
| summarize UsageCount = count() by Hour = toint(Hour), AppCategory
| summarize 
    Security_Copilot = sumif(UsageCount, AppCategory == "Security_Copilot"),
    AI_Studio = sumif(UsageCount, AppCategory == "AI_Studio"),
    GitHub_Copilot = sumif(UsageCount, AppCategory == "GitHub_Copilot"),
    M365_Copilot = sumif(UsageCount, AppCategory == "M365_Copilot"),
    Other_AI_Apps = sumif(UsageCount, AppCategory == "Other_AI_Apps")
  by Hour
| project 
    Hour,
    [' Security Copilot'] = Security_Copilot,
    [' AI Studio'] = AI_Studio,
    [' GitHub Copilot'] = GitHub_Copilot,
    [' M365 Copilot'] = M365_Copilot,
    [' Other AI Apps'] = Other_AI_Apps
| order by Hour asc

content.title: 📊 AI Security Risk Correlation Summary

content.json:
🛡️ MITRE ATT&CK AI Threat Mapping

Author: Jason Liang

> **Value Statement**: This view maps AI-related security threats to the MITRE ATT&CK framework. By applying standardized threat classification and technique mapping, it helps security teams understand AI attack chains, uncover defensive gaps, and design industry-aligned detection and response strategies.

🎯 Tactic Mapping

Align AI threats with MITRE ATT&CK tactics and techniques for consistent reporting

🔍 Gap Analysis

Identify coverage gaps and weak controls across the AI defense surface

---

content.query:
// MITRE ATT&CK AI threat mapping (balanced color version)
let aiKeywords = dynamic(["AI", "Model", "Prompt", "Copilot", "LLM", "GPT", "Jailbreak", "Injection"]);

// 1. Try to use native Sentinel MITRE data first
let nativeMitreAlerts = SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where AlertName has_any (aiKeywords)
| where isnotempty(Tactics) or isnotempty(Techniques)
| extend 
    NativeTactics = tostring(Tactics),
    NativeTechniques = tostring(Techniques),
    DataSource = "Sentinel Native"
| project TimeGenerated, AlertName, AlertSeverity, 
          MITRETactic = NativeTactics, MITRETechnique = NativeTechniques, DataSource;

// 2. AI-enhanced mapping
let enhancedMitreAlerts = SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where AlertName has_any (aiKeywords)
| where isempty(Tactics) and isempty(Techniques)
| extend 
    MITRETactic = case(
        AlertName has_any ("Prompt Injection", "Social Engineering", "Supply Chain"), "TA0001-Initial Access",
        AlertName has_any ("Code Injection", "Jailbreak", "Model Hijacking"), "TA0002-Execution",
        AlertName has_any ("Backdoor", "Model Poisoning", "Training Data Manipulation"), "TA0003-Persistence",
        AlertName has_any ("Privilege Escalation", "Authorization Bypass"), "TA0004-Privilege Escalation",
        AlertName has_any ("Defense Evasion", "Model Evasion", "Adversarial Attack"), "TA0005-Defense Evasion",
        AlertName has_any ("Credential", "Token", "API Key"), "TA0006-Credential Access",
        AlertName has_any ("Discovery", "Reconnaissance", "Model Architecture"), "TA0007-Discovery",
        AlertName has_any ("Lateral Movement", "Model Chaining"), "TA0008-Lateral Movement",
        AlertName has_any ("Data Collection", "Model Extraction", "Training Data Theft"), "TA0009-Collection",
        AlertName has_any ("Exfiltration", "Data Theft", "Model Theft"), "TA0010-Exfiltration",
        AlertName has_any ("Impact", "Model Corruption", "Service Disruption"), "TA0011-Impact",
        "Unknown"
    ),
    MITRETechnique = case(
        AlertName has_any ("Prompt Injection", "Social Engineering"), "T1566-Phishing",
        AlertName has_any ("Code Injection", "Jailbreak"), "T1059-Command and Scripting Interpreter",
        AlertName has_any ("Model Poisoning", "Backdoor"), "T1546-Event Triggered Execution",
        AlertName has_any ("Defense Evasion", "Model Evasion"), "T1562-Impair Defenses",
        AlertName has_any ("Privilege Escalation"), "T1078-Valid Accounts",
        AlertName has_any ("Credential", "Token"), "T1555-Credentials from Password Stores",
        AlertName has_any ("Discovery", "Reconnaissance"), "T1083-File and Directory Discovery",
        AlertName has_any ("Lateral Movement"), "T1021-Remote Services",
        AlertName has_any ("Data Collection", "Model Extraction"), "T1005-Data from Local System",
        AlertName has_any ("Exfiltration", "Data Theft"), "T1041-Exfiltration Over C2 Channel",
        AlertName has_any ("Model Corruption", "Impact"), "T1485-Data Destruction",
        AlertName has_any ("Adversarial Attack"), "T1XXX-Adversarial ML Attack",
        "Unknown"
    ),
    DataSource = "AI Enhanced Mapping"
| project TimeGenerated, AlertName, AlertSeverity, MITRETactic, MITRETechnique, DataSource;

// 3. Combine and classify
let allMitreData = nativeMitreAlerts
| union enhancedMitreAlerts
| extend 
    AIThreatCategory = case(
        AlertName has_any ("Prompt Injection", "Jailbreak"), "💉 AI Prompt Attacks",
        AlertName has_any ("Model Poisoning", "Backdoor"), "☠️ AI Model Poisoning",
        AlertName has_any ("Adversarial", "Evasion"), "⚔️ Adversarial Attacks",
        AlertName has_any ("Exfiltration", "Data Theft"), "📤 AI Data Exfiltration",
        AlertName has_any ("Privilege", "Authorization"), "👑 AI Privilege Abuse",
        AlertName has_any ("Discovery", "Reconnaissance"), "🔍 AI Reconnaissance",
        AlertName has_any ("Lateral", "Chaining"), "🔗 AI Lateral Movement",
        AlertName has_any ("Credential", "Token"), "🔑 AI Credential Theft",
        AlertName has_any ("Impact", "Corruption"), "💥 AI Destructive Attacks",
        "⚠️ Other AI Threats"
    );

// 4. Produce the final metrics
allMitreData
| where MITRETactic != "Unknown"
| summarize 
    AlertCount = count(),
    HighSeverityCount = countif(AlertSeverity == "High"),
    MediumSeverityCount = countif(AlertSeverity == "Medium"),
    LowSeverityCount = countif(AlertSeverity == "Low"),
    LastAlert = max(TimeGenerated),
    DataSources = make_set(DataSource),
    SampleAlerts = make_set(AlertName, 3)
  by MITRETactic, MITRETechnique, AIThreatCategory
| extend 
    // Calculate risk score
    CalculatedRiskScore = HighSeverityCount * 5 + MediumSeverityCount * 2 + LowSeverityCount * 1
| extend
    // Risk level: higher score = hotter color
    RiskLevel = case(
        CalculatedRiskScore >= 50, "🔥 Extreme Risk",
        CalculatedRiskScore >= 20, "🔴 High Risk",
        CalculatedRiskScore >= 10, "🟠 Moderate Risk",
        CalculatedRiskScore >= 1, "🟡 Low Risk",
        "⚪ No Risk"
    ),
    ThreatDensity = round(todouble(AlertCount) / 30.0, 2)
| project 
    ['MITRE Tactic'] = MITRETactic,
    ['MITRE Technique'] = MITRETechnique,
    ['AI Threat Category'] = AIThreatCategory,
    ['Risk Level'] = RiskLevel,
    ['Risk Score'] = CalculatedRiskScore,
    ['Total Alerts'] = AlertCount,
    ['High-Severity Alerts'] = HighSeverityCount,
    ['Medium-Severity Alerts'] = MediumSeverityCount,
    ['Low-Severity Alerts'] = LowSeverityCount,
    ['Threat Density/Day'] = ThreatDensity,
    ['Data Source'] = tostring(DataSources),
    ['Sample Alerts'] = tostring(SampleAlerts),
    ['Latest Alert'] = format_datetime(LastAlert, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Risk Score'] desc, ['High-Severity Alerts'] desc, ['Total Alerts'] desc
| take 25

//  Advanced Prompt Injection & Jailbreak Detection
// Maps AI-specific attacks to MITRE ATT&CK and OWASP Top 10 for LLM
// Uses Azure AI Content Safety, Prompt Shield, and Defender for AI detections
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
union isfuzzy=true
    (
    // Azure Prompt Shield & Content Safety detections
    AuditLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > t0
    | where OperationName has_any ("PromptShield", "ContentSafety")
    | extend
        DetectionSource = "Azure Prompt Shield",
        AttackVector = case(
            TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties[0].newValue has "DirectAttack", "Direct Prompt Injection",
            TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties[0].newValue has "IndirectAttack", "Indirect Prompt Injection",
            OperationName has "PromptShield", "Prompt Shield Detection",
            "Content Safety Violation"
        ),
        MITRETechnique = "LLM01 - Prompt Injection",
        MITRETactic = "TA0001 - Initial Access",
        Severity = case(
            TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties[0].newValue has "High", "Critical",
            TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties[0].newValue has "Medium", "High",
            "Medium"
        ),
        UserPrincipal = tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName),
        UserIP = tostring(InitiatedBy.user.ipAddress),
        Details = tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties[0].newValue)
    | project TimeGenerated, DetectionSource, AttackVector, MITRETechnique, MITRETactic, Severity, UserPrincipal, UserIP, Details
    ),
    (
    // Defender for AI security alerts - Jailbreak and Prompt Injection
    SecurityAlert
    | where TimeGenerated > t0
    | where AlertName has_any ("Prompt Injection", "Jailbreak", "AI", "Model")
    | extend
        DetectionSource = "Defender for AI",
        AttackVector = case(
            AlertName has "Prompt Injection", "Prompt Injection Attack",
            AlertName has "Jailbreak", "Jailbreak Attack (DAN)",
            AlertName has "Model Abuse", "Model Abuse Attack",
            AlertName has "Data Poisoning", "Data Poisoning Attack",
            "AI Security Alert"
        ),
        MITRETechnique = case(
            AlertName has "Prompt Injection", "LLM01 - Prompt Injection",
            AlertName has "Jailbreak", "LLM01 - Prompt Injection (Jailbreak)",
            AlertName has "Model", "LLM02 - Insecure Output Handling",
            AlertName has "Data", "LLM03 - Training Data Poisoning",
            "LLM01 - Prompt Injection"
        ),
        MITRETactic = case(
            AlertName has_any ("Jailbreak", "Bypass"), "TA0005 - Defense Evasion",
            AlertName has "Data", "TA0003 - Persistence",
            "TA0001 - Initial Access"
        ),
        Severity = case(
            AlertSeverity == "High", "Critical",
            AlertSeverity == "Medium", "High",
            "Medium"
        ),
        UserPrincipal = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).UserPrincipalName),
        UserIP = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).ClientIP),
        Details = AlertName
    | project TimeGenerated, DetectionSource, AttackVector, MITRETechnique, MITRETactic, Severity, UserPrincipal, UserIP, Details
    )
| summarize
    AttackCount = count(),
    CriticalCount = countif(Severity == "Critical"),
    HighCount = countif(Severity == "High"),
    MediumCount = countif(Severity == "Medium"),
    UniqueAttackers = dcount(UserPrincipal),
    UniqueIPs = dcount(UserIP),
    AttackerList = make_set(UserPrincipal, 5),
    IPList = make_set(UserIP, 5),
    SampleDetails = make_set(Details, 2),
    FirstDetected = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastDetected = max(TimeGenerated)
  by DetectionSource, AttackVector, MITRETechnique, MITRETactic
| extend
    RiskScore = (CriticalCount * 5) + (HighCount * 3) + (MediumCount * 2),
    AttackFrequency = round(todouble(AttackCount) / todouble(datetime_diff('hour', LastDetected, FirstDetected) + 1), 1)
| extend ThreatLevel = case(
    RiskScore >= 50, " Critical Threat",
    RiskScore >= 20, " High Threat",
    RiskScore >= 10, " Medium Threat",
    RiskScore >= 1, " Low Threat",
    "? Minimal"
)
| project
    ['Threat Level'] = ThreatLevel,
    ['Attack Vector'] = AttackVector,
    ['MITRE Technique'] = MITRETechnique,
    ['MITRE Tactic'] = MITRETactic,
    ['Detection Source'] = DetectionSource,
    ['Risk Score'] = RiskScore,
    ['Total Attacks'] = AttackCount,
    ['Critical'] = CriticalCount,
    ['High'] = HighCount,
    ['Medium'] = MediumCount,
    ['Attacks/Hour'] = AttackFrequency,
    ['Unique Attackers'] = UniqueAttackers,
    ['Unique IPs'] = UniqueIPs,
    ['Attacker Samples'] = tostring(AttackerList),
    ['IP Samples'] = tostring(IPList),
    ['Attack Examples'] = tostring(SampleDetails),
    ['First Detected'] = format_datetime(FirstDetected, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Last Detected'] = format_datetime(LastDetected, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Risk Score'] desc, ['Total Attacks'] desc
content.title: ⚔️ Prompt Injection & Jailbreak Detection (MITRE Mapped)

content.query:
//  AI Attack Timeline - Hourly Trend
// Tracks attack patterns over time with MITRE ATT&CK mapping
// Uses Azure AI Content Safety and Defender for AI detections
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
union isfuzzy=true
    (
    // Azure AI Content Safety & Prompt Shield detections
    AuditLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > t0
    | where OperationName has_any ("PromptShield", "ContentSafety")
    | extend
        AttackType = case(
            TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties[0].newValue has "DirectAttack", "Direct Prompt Injection (LLM01)",
            TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties[0].newValue has "IndirectAttack", "Indirect Prompt Injection (LLM01)",
            OperationName has "PromptShield", "Prompt Shield Detection (LLM01)",
            "Content Safety Violation"
        ),
        HourBucket = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h),
        SourceIP = tostring(InitiatedBy.user.ipAddress)
    | project HourBucket, AttackType, SourceIP
    ),
    (
    // Defender for AI detections
    SecurityAlert
    | where TimeGenerated > t0
    | where AlertName has_any ("AI", "Prompt", "Jailbreak", "Injection", "Model")
    | extend
        AttackType = case(
            AlertName has "Prompt Injection", "Prompt Injection Attack (LLM01)",
            AlertName has "Jailbreak", "Jailbreak Attack (LLM01)",
            AlertName has "Model", "Model Abuse (LLM02)",
            AlertName has "Data", "Data Poisoning (LLM03)",
            "AI Security Alert"
        ),
        HourBucket = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h),
        SourceIP = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).ClientIP)
    | project HourBucket, AttackType, SourceIP
    )
| summarize
    AttackCount = count(),
    UniqueAttackers = dcount(SourceIP)
  by HourBucket, AttackType
| project
    Time = HourBucket,
    ['Attack Type'] = AttackType,
    ['Attack Count'] = AttackCount,
    ['Unique IPs'] = UniqueAttackers
| order by Time desc
content.title: 📅 AI Attack Vector Timeline (MITRE Techniques)

content.json:
🚨 AI Threat Response & Mitigation

Author: Jason Liang

> **Value Statement**: This view tracks response efficiency for AI-related security incidents and summarizes standardized playbooks. Use it to assess team readiness, shorten containment cycles, and enforce consistent mitigation actions.

⚡ Incident Response

Outline repeatable AI incident workflows and recommended containment steps

📊 Efficiency Analytics

Monitor mean time to resolve, closure rates, and responder workload trends

---

content.query:
// AI incident response efficiency KPIs
SecurityIncident
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where Title has_any ("AI", "Model", "Prompt", "Copilot", "Jailbreak")
| extend 
    IsResolved = (Status == "Closed" or Status == "Resolved"),
    ResponseTimeMinutes = datetime_diff('minute', ClosedTime, CreatedTime)
| summarize 
    TotalIncidents = count(),
    ResolvedIncidents = countif(IsResolved),
    AvgResponseTime = round(avg(ResponseTimeMinutes), 0),
    MedianResponseTime = round(percentile(ResponseTimeMinutes, 50), 0),
    MaxResponseTime = round(max(ResponseTimeMinutes), 0)
| extend 
    ResolutionRate = round(todouble(ResolvedIncidents) / todouble(TotalIncidents) * 100, 1)
| project 
    data = pack_array(
        pack("Metric", "🔢 Total Incidents", "Value", tostring(TotalIncidents), "Description", "Total AI-related security incidents in the last 30 days"),
        pack("Metric", "✅ Resolved Incidents", "Value", tostring(ResolvedIncidents), "Description", "Number of AI security incidents successfully closed"),
        pack("Metric", "📊 Resolution Rate", "Value", strcat(tostring(ResolutionRate), "%"), "Description", "Percentage of incidents resolved"),
        pack("Metric", "⏱️ Mean Response Time", "Value", strcat(tostring(AvgResponseTime), " minutes"), "Description", "Average duration from discovery to resolution"),
        pack("Metric", "⏱️ Median Response Time", "Value", strcat(tostring(MedianResponseTime), " minutes"), "Description", "Median response time across incidents"),
        pack("Metric", "⏱️ Longest Response Time", "Value", strcat(tostring(MaxResponseTime), " minutes"), "Description", "Maximum time required to close a single incident")
    )
| mv-expand data
| evaluate bag_unpack(data)
content.title: 📊 AI Incident Response Efficiency

content.query:
// AI security response recommendations (color-aligned version)
datatable(
    ThreatType:string,
    Severity:string,
    ResponseAction:string,
    Priority:string,
    EstimatedTime:string,
    ResponsibleTeam:string
)[
    "AI Jailbreak Attempt", "High", "Immediately revise AI safety policies, tighten input validation, and harden output filtering", "Critical", "2 hours", "AI Security Team",
    "Prompt Injection", "High", "Deploy prompt filtering, refresh detection rules, and expand content moderation coverage", "Critical", "4 hours", "Security Operations Center",
    "Model Poisoning", "High", "Isolate the affected model, roll back to a trusted version, and retrain with clean data", "Critical", "8 hours", "AI Development Team",
    "Data Exfiltration", "High", "Immediately isolate impacted systems, scope exposed data, and notify stakeholders", "Critical", "1 hour", "Incident Response Team",
    "Model Theft", "Medium", "Strengthen access controls, apply model encryption, and enable watermarking", "High", "12 hours", "AI Security Team",
    "Privilege Abuse", "Medium", "Reset affected account privileges, audit access logs, and enforce strong authentication", "Medium", "6 hours", "Identity Management Team",
    "Adversarial Attack", "Medium", "Deploy adversarial detection models and improve model robustness", "Medium", "24 hours", "AI Research Team",
    "Anomalous Access", "Low", "Enhance monitoring, update geo-velocity controls, and analyze access patterns", "Low", "12 hours", "Network Security Team",
    "API Abuse", "Low", "Enforce API rate limiting and monitor for anomalous invocation patterns", "Low", "8 hours", "API Management Team",
    "Misconfiguration", "Low", "Correct security settings and run baseline configuration checks", "Low", "4 hours", "Systems Administration Team"
]
| extend 
    SeverityIcon = case(
        Severity == "High", "🔴",
        Severity == "Medium", "🟠",
        Severity == "Low", "🟡",
        "⚪"
    ),
    PriorityIcon = case(
        Priority == "Critical", "🔥",
        Priority == "High", "🔴",
        Priority == "Medium", "🟠",
        Priority == "Low", "🟢",
        "⚪"
    ),
    PriorityOrder = case(
        Priority == "Critical", 1,
        Priority == "High", 2,
        Priority == "Medium", 3,
        Priority == "Low", 4,
        5
    ),
    ThreatIcon = case(
        ThreatType == "AI Jailbreak Attempt", "🚨",
        ThreatType == "Prompt Injection", "💉",
        ThreatType == "Model Poisoning", "☠️",
        ThreatType == "Data Exfiltration", "📤",
        ThreatType == "Model Theft", "🔓",
        ThreatType == "Privilege Abuse", "👑",
        ThreatType == "Adversarial Attack", "⚔️",
        ThreatType == "Anomalous Access", "🔍",
        ThreatType == "API Abuse", "🔌",
        ThreatType == "Misconfiguration", "⚙️",
        "⚠️"
    )
| project 
    ['Threat Type'] = strcat(ThreatIcon, " ", ThreatType),
    ['Severity'] = strcat(SeverityIcon, " ", Severity),
    ['Priority'] = strcat(PriorityIcon, " ", Priority),
    ['Response Actions'] = ResponseAction,
    ['Estimated Time'] = EstimatedTime,
    ['Responsible Team'] = ResponsibleTeam,
    PriorityOrder
| order by PriorityOrder asc
| project-away PriorityOrder
content.title: 📋 Standard Response Playbooks

content.query:
// AI incident response success trend (repaired version)
SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime > ago(90d)
| where Title has_any ("AI", "Model", "Prompt", "Copilot", "Jailbreak")
| extend 
    IsResolved = (Status == "Closed" or Status == "Resolved"),
    WeekStart = startofweek(CreatedTime)
| summarize 
    TotalIncidents = count(),
    ResolvedIncidents = countif(IsResolved),
    AvgResolutionTimeHours = round(avg(datetime_diff('hour', ClosedTime, CreatedTime)), 1)
  by WeekStart
| extend 
    SuccessRate = round(todouble(ResolvedIncidents) / todouble(TotalIncidents) * 100, 1)
| order by WeekStart asc
| project 
    WeekStart,
    ['Resolution Rate %'] = SuccessRate,
    ['Total Incidents'] = TotalIncidents,
    ['Resolved Incidents'] = ResolvedIncidents,
    ['Average Resolution Time (Hours)'] = AvgResolutionTimeHours
| render timechart
content.title: 📈 AI Incident Response Success Trend

content.query:
//  Defender for AI Automated Response & Security Incident Tracking
// Tracks AI security incidents and response actions from Defender for AI and Sentinel
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
union isfuzzy=true
    (
    // Security Alerts from Defender for AI
    SecurityAlert
    | where TimeGenerated > t0
    | where AlertName has_any ("AI", "Prompt", "Jailbreak", "Model", "Injection", "Data Poisoning")
    | extend
        ResponseAction = case(
            Status == "Resolved", "✅ Alert Resolved",
            Status == "InProgress", "🔄 Investigation In Progress",
            Status == "New", "🆕 New Alert",
            "⚪ Other Status"
        ),
        ThreatType = case(
            AlertName has "Prompt Injection", "Prompt Injection Attack",
            AlertName has "Jailbreak", "Jailbreak Attack",
            AlertName has "Model", "Model Abuse",
            AlertName has "Data Poisoning", "Data Poisoning",
            "AI Security Threat"
        ),
        Severity = case(
            AlertSeverity == "High", "Critical",
            AlertSeverity == "Medium", "High",
            AlertSeverity == "Low", "Medium",
            "Low"
        ),
        AffectedEntity = tostring(parse_json(tostring(Entities))[0])
    | extend ExtendedProps = todynamic(ExtendedProperties)
    | extend
        UserAccount = tostring(ExtendedProps.UserPrincipalName),
        SourceIP = tostring(ExtendedProps.ClientIP)
    | project TimeGenerated, ResponseAction, ThreatType, Severity, AlertName, AffectedEntity, UserAccount, SourceIP, Status
    ),
    (
    // Security Incidents from Sentinel
    SecurityIncident
    | where TimeGenerated > t0
    | where Title has_any ("AI", "Prompt", "Jailbreak", "Model", "Copilot")
    | extend
        ResponseAction = case(
            Status == "Closed", "✅ Incident Closed",
            Status == "Active", "🔄 Active Investigation",
            Status == "New", "🆕 New Incident",
            "⚪ Other Status"
        ),
        ThreatType = case(
            Title has "Prompt", "Prompt-based Attack",
            Title has "Jailbreak", "Jailbreak Attempt",
            Title has "Model", "AI Model Threat",
            Title has "Data", "Data Security Threat",
            "AI Security Incident"
        ),
        Severity = case(
            Severity == "High", "Critical",
            Severity == "Medium", "High",
            "Medium"
        ),
        AffectedEntity = tostring(RelatedEntities),
        UserAccount = Owner.assignedTo,
        SourceIP = ""
    | project TimeGenerated, ResponseAction, ThreatType, Severity, AlertName = Title, AffectedEntity, UserAccount, SourceIP, Status
    )
| summarize
    ActionCount = count(),
    CriticalActions = countif(Severity == "Critical"),
    HighActions = countif(Severity == "High"),
    ResolvedCount = countif(ResponseAction has_any ("Resolved", "Closed")),
    InProgressCount = countif(ResponseAction has_any ("Progress", "Active")),
    NewCount = countif(ResponseAction has_any ("New")),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserAccount),
    UniqueIPs = dcount(SourceIP),
    SampleAlerts = make_set(AlertName, 3),
    FirstAction = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastAction = max(TimeGenerated)
  by ResponseAction, ThreatType, Severity
| extend
    EffectivenessScore = case(
        ResolvedCount >= 10, 5,
        ResolvedCount >= 5, 4,
        InProgressCount >= 5, 3,
        ActionCount >= 10, 2,
        1
    ),
    ResolutionRate = case(
        ActionCount > 0, round(todouble(ResolvedCount) / todouble(ActionCount) * 100, 1),
        0.0
    )
| extend
    ResponseStatus = case(
        EffectivenessScore >= 4, "🟢 Highly Effective",
        EffectivenessScore >= 3, "🟡 Effective",
        EffectivenessScore >= 2, "🟠 Moderate",
        "🔴 Limited"
    )
| project
    ['Response Action'] = ResponseAction,
    ['Threat Type'] = ThreatType,
    ['Response Status'] = ResponseStatus,
    ['Severity'] = Severity,
    ['Effectiveness Score'] = EffectivenessScore,
    ['Resolution Rate %'] = ResolutionRate,
    ['Total Actions'] = ActionCount,
    ['Critical Actions'] = CriticalActions,
    ['High-Impact Actions'] = HighActions,
    ['Resolved'] = ResolvedCount,
    ['In Progress'] = InProgressCount,
    ['New'] = NewCount,
    ['Users Affected'] = UniqueUsers,
    ['Unique IPs'] = UniqueIPs,
    ['Alert Samples'] = tostring(SampleAlerts),
    ['First Action'] = format_datetime(FirstAction, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Last Action'] = format_datetime(LastAction, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Effectiveness Score'] desc, ['Total Actions'] desc
content.title: 🛡️ Defender for AI Security Response & Incident Tracking

content.query:
//  AI Access from Non-Compliant & Risky Devices
// Monitors AI application access from non-compliant or high-risk devices that should be isolated
// Uses Entra ID SigninLogs for real device compliance data
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > t0
| where AppDisplayName has_any ("AI", "Copilot", "chat", "gpt", "Claude", "Bard")
| extend
    IsCompliant = tostring(DeviceDetail.isCompliant),
    IsManaged = tostring(DeviceDetail.isManaged),
    TrustType = tostring(DeviceDetail.trustType),
    DeviceId = tostring(DeviceDetail.deviceId),
    DisplayName = tostring(DeviceDetail.displayName),
    OS = tostring(DeviceDetail.operatingSystem)
| where IsCompliant == "false" or IsManaged == "false" or RiskLevelDuringSignIn != "none"
| extend
    RemediationAction = case(
        RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "high" and IsCompliant == "false", "🔥 Requires Isolation (High Risk + Non-Compliant)",
        RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "high", "🔴 High Risk - Monitor Closely",
        IsCompliant == "false" and IsManaged == "false", "🚫 Block Unmanaged Non-Compliant Device",
        IsCompliant == "false", "⚠️ Enforce Compliance Policy",
        IsManaged == "false", "📱 Require Device Enrollment",
        RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "medium", "🟡 Moderate Risk - Review",
        "ℹ️ Review Device Status"
    ),
    Platform = case(
        OS has "Windows", "Windows",
        OS has "iOS", "iOS",
        OS has "Android", "Android",
        OS has "Mac", "macOS",
        OS has "Linux", "Linux",
        "Other"
    ),
    ActionSeverity = case(
        RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "high" and IsCompliant == "false", "Critical",
        RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "high" or (IsCompliant == "false" and IsManaged == "false"), "High",
        IsCompliant == "false" or RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "medium", "Medium",
        "Low"
    ),
    RiskLevel = case(
        RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "high", "High Risk",
        RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "medium", "Medium Risk",
        RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "low", "Low Risk",
        "No Risk Data"
    )
| summarize
    ActionCount = count(),
    CriticalDevices = dcountif(DeviceId, ActionSeverity == "Critical"),
    HighRiskDevices = dcountif(DeviceId, ActionSeverity == "High"),
    NonCompliantDevices = dcountif(DeviceId, IsCompliant == "false"),
    UnmanagedDevices = dcountif(DeviceId, IsManaged == "false"),
    UniqueDevices = dcount(DeviceId),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserPrincipalName),
    UniqueApps = dcount(AppDisplayName),
    DeviceList = make_set(DisplayName, 5),
    UserList = make_set(UserPrincipalName, 5),
    AppList = make_set(AppDisplayName, 3),
    FirstAccess = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastAccess = max(TimeGenerated)
  by RemediationAction, ActionSeverity, Platform, RiskLevel
| extend
    ImpactScore = (CriticalDevices * 5) + (HighRiskDevices * 3) + (NonCompliantDevices * 2) + (UnmanagedDevices * 1),
    AccessFrequency = round(todouble(ActionCount) / todouble(datetime_diff('day', LastAccess, FirstAccess) + 1), 1)
| extend ResponseEffectiveness = case(
    ImpactScore >= 50, " Urgent Action Required",
    ImpactScore >= 20, " High Priority",
    ImpactScore >= 10, " Medium Priority",
    ImpactScore >= 1, " Low Priority",
    " Informational"
)
| project
    ['Remediation Action'] = RemediationAction,
    ['Platform'] = Platform,
    ['Priority Level'] = ResponseEffectiveness,
    ['Severity'] = ActionSeverity,
    ['Risk Level'] = RiskLevel,
    ['Impact Score'] = ImpactScore,
    ['Total AI Access'] = ActionCount,
    ['Access/Day'] = AccessFrequency,
    ['Critical Devices'] = CriticalDevices,
    ['High Risk Devices'] = HighRiskDevices,
    ['Non-Compliant'] = NonCompliantDevices,
    ['Unmanaged'] = UnmanagedDevices,
    ['Unique Devices'] = UniqueDevices,
    ['Users Affected'] = UniqueUsers,
    ['AI Apps Accessed'] = UniqueApps,
    ['Device Samples'] = tostring(DeviceList),
    ['User Samples'] = tostring(UserList),
    ['App Samples'] = tostring(AppList),
    ['First Access'] = format_datetime(FirstAccess, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Last Access'] = format_datetime(LastAccess, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Impact Score'] desc, ['Total AI Access'] desc
content.title: ⚠️ AI Access from Non-Compliant & Risky Devices

content.json:
📦 AI Model Inventory & Vulnerability Management

Author: Jason Liang

> **Value Statement**: This view combines Microsoft Defender for Cloud telemetry with Azure resource discovery to expose the living inventory of AI services. Track baseline coverage, monitor outstanding vulnerabilities, and surface actionable intelligence to keep AI deployments aligned with enterprise security standards.

📋 Asset Inventory

Continuously track AI services deployed in Azure along with key security indicators

🔧 Vulnerability Governance

Prioritize remediation using live Defender for Cloud findings mapped to AI workloads

---

content.query:
// AI Model Asset Inventory - Based on Available Data Sources (Fixed)
// Approach 1: Get AI service information from Azure Activity Logs
let aiServiceEvents = AzureActivity
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| where ResourceProvider in (
    "Microsoft.CognitiveServices",
    "Microsoft.MachineLearningServices", 
    "Microsoft.OpenAI",
    "Microsoft.BotService"
)
| where OperationNameValue in (
    "Microsoft.CognitiveServices/accounts/write",
    "Microsoft.MachineLearningServices/workspaces/write",
    "Microsoft.OpenAI/accounts/write",
    "Microsoft.BotService/botServices/write"
)
| extend 
    AIServiceType = case(
        ResourceProvider == "Microsoft.CognitiveServices", "🧠 Cognitive Services",
        ResourceProvider == "Microsoft.MachineLearningServices", "📊 Machine Learning Services",
        ResourceProvider == "Microsoft.OpenAI", "🤖 Azure OpenAI",
        ResourceProvider == "Microsoft.BotService", "🤝 Bot Services",
        "⚙️ Other AI Services"
    ),
    ServiceName = coalesce(Resource, ResourceId)
| summarize 
    LastActivity = max(TimeGenerated),
    ActivityCount = count(),
    UniqueOperations = dcount(OperationNameValue)
  by ServiceName, AIServiceType, ResourceGroup, ResourceProvider;

// Approach 2: Identify AI-related resources from security alerts
let aiSecurityAlerts = SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where CompromisedEntity has_any ("cognitive", "openai", "ml", "bot", "ai")
| extend 
    AIResourceName = CompromisedEntity,
    AIServiceType = case(
        CompromisedEntity has "cognitive", "🧠 Cognitive Services",
        CompromisedEntity has "openai", "🤖 Azure OpenAI", 
        CompromisedEntity has "ml", "📊 Machine Learning Services",
        CompromisedEntity has "bot", "🤝 Bot Services",
        "⚙️ Other AI Services"
    )
| summarize 
    TotalAlerts = count(),
    HighSeverityAlerts = countif(AlertSeverity == "High"),
    LastAlert = max(TimeGenerated)
  by AIResourceName, AIServiceType;

// Merge data sources
aiServiceEvents
| join kind=fullouter (aiSecurityAlerts) on $left.ServiceName == $right.AIResourceName
| extend 
    FinalServiceName = coalesce(ServiceName, AIResourceName),
    FinalServiceType = coalesce(AIServiceType, AIServiceType1),
    TotalAlerts = coalesce(TotalAlerts, 0),
    HighSeverityAlerts = coalesce(HighSeverityAlerts, 0)
| extend 
    RiskScore = case(
        HighSeverityAlerts >= 5, 90,
        HighSeverityAlerts >= 3, 75,
        HighSeverityAlerts >= 1, 60,
        TotalAlerts >= 5, 45,
        TotalAlerts >= 1, 30,
        15
    ),
    RiskLevel = case(
        HighSeverityAlerts >= 5, "🔥 Critical Risk",
        HighSeverityAlerts >= 3, "🔴 High Risk",
        HighSeverityAlerts >= 1 or TotalAlerts >= 5, "🟠 Medium Risk",
        TotalAlerts >= 1, "🟡 Low Risk",
        "🟢 No Risk"
    ),
    SecurityStatus = case(
        HighSeverityAlerts > 0, strcat("🚨 ", tostring(HighSeverityAlerts), " Critical Alerts"),
        TotalAlerts > 0, strcat("⚠️ ", tostring(TotalAlerts), " General Alerts"),
        "✅ No Security Alerts"
    )
| project 
    ['AI Service Name'] = FinalServiceName,
    ['Service Type'] = FinalServiceType,
    ['Resource Group'] = coalesce(ResourceGroup, "Unknown"),
    ['Risk Level'] = RiskLevel,
    ['Risk Score'] = RiskScore,
    ['Security Status'] = SecurityStatus,
    ['Critical Alerts'] = HighSeverityAlerts,
    ['Total Alerts'] = TotalAlerts,
    ['Last Activity'] = coalesce(LastActivity, LastAlert),
    ['Activity Count'] = coalesce(ActivityCount, 0)
| order by ['Risk Score'] desc, ['Total Alerts'] desc
| take 25
content.title: 📦 AI Service Asset Inventory & Risk Assessment

content.query:
// AI Service Configuration Change Monitoring
AuditLogs
| extend TargetResourcesText = tostring(TargetResources), AdditionalDetailsText = tostring(AdditionalDetails)
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where OperationName has_any ('Add', 'Update', 'Delete', 'Modify', 'Create', 'Remove', 'Grant', 'Revoke')
| where TargetResourcesText has_any ('cognitive', 'openai', 'machinelearning', 'bot', 'ai') or
        AdditionalDetailsText has_any ('CognitiveServices', 'OpenAI', 'MachineLearning', 'BotService') or
        Category == 'ApplicationManagement'
| extend
    ResourceName = coalesce(
        tostring(TargetResources[0].displayName),
        tostring(TargetResources[0].userPrincipalName),
        tostring(TargetResources[0].id),
        'Unknown Resource'
    ),
    Actor = coalesce(
        tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName),
        tostring(InitiatedBy.app.displayName),
        tostring(InitiatedBy.app.servicePrincipalName),
        'System Operation'
    ),
    SourceIP = coalesce(
        tostring(InitiatedBy.user.ipAddress),
        tostring(InitiatedBy.app.ipAddress),
        'IP Not Recorded'
    ),
    AIServiceType = case(
        TargetResourcesText has 'cognitive' or AdditionalDetailsText has 'CognitiveServices', '🧠 Cognitive Services',
        TargetResourcesText has 'openai' or AdditionalDetailsText has 'OpenAI', '🤖 Azure OpenAI',
        TargetResourcesText has 'machinelearning' or AdditionalDetailsText has 'MachineLearning', '📊 Machine Learning',
        TargetResourcesText has 'bot' or AdditionalDetailsText has 'BotService', '🤖 Bot Service',
        TargetResourcesText has 'copilot' or AdditionalDetailsText has 'Copilot', '💼 Microsoft Copilot',
        Category == 'ApplicationManagement', '📱 Application Management',
        '⚙️ Other Services'
    ),
    RiskLevel = case(
        OperationName has_any ('Delete', 'Remove', 'Revoke'), '🔴 High-Risk Operation',
        OperationName has_any ('Grant', 'Add') and TargetResourcesText has_any ('admin', 'owner', 'contributor'), '🔴 Privilege Escalation',
        OperationName has_any ('Update', 'Modify') and TargetResourcesText has_any ('key', 'secret', 'credential'), '🟠 Sensitive Change',
        OperationName has_any ('Create', 'Add'), '🟡 Resource Creation',
        '🟢 Routine Operation'
    ),
    ChangeDetails = case(
        OperationName has 'Add', strcat('Added: ', tostring(TargetResources[0].type)),
        OperationName has 'Delete', strcat('Deleted: ', tostring(TargetResources[0].type)),
        OperationName has 'Grant', strcat('Permission Action: ', OperationName),
        strcat('Operation: ', OperationName)
    ),
    OriginalTime = TimeGenerated
| project
    ['Timestamp'] = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
    ['AI Service Type'] = AIServiceType,
    ['Resource Name'] = ResourceName,
    ['Operation Type'] = OperationName,
    ['Risk Level'] = RiskLevel,
    ['Actor'] = Actor,
    ['Source IP Address'] = SourceIP,
    ['Change Details'] = ChangeDetails,
    ['Operation Result'] = Result,
    OriginalTime
| order by OriginalTime desc
| project-away OriginalTime
| take 30
content.title: ⚙️ AI Service Configuration Change Monitoring

content.query:
//  AI Service Access Authorization Monitoring
// Tracks AI service access permissions and authorization changes
// Uses Entra ID AuditLogs for application consent and permission grants
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
AuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated > t0
| where Category == "ApplicationManagement"
| where OperationName has_any ("Consent to application", "Add service principal", "Add OAuth2PermissionGrant")
| where TargetResources[0].displayName has_any ("AI", "Cognitive", "OpenAI", "Bot", "Copilot", "GPT", "Machine Learning") or 
        tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties) has_any ("Cognitive", "OpenAI", "AI")
| extend
    AppName = tostring(TargetResources[0].displayName),
    AppId = tostring(TargetResources[0].id),
    PermissionsGranted = tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties[0].newValue)
| extend
    Actor = coalesce(
        tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName),
        tostring(InitiatedBy.app.displayName),
        "System Operation"
    ),
    AIServiceType = case(
        AppName has "Cognitive" or tostring(TargetResources) has "Cognitive", "🧠 Cognitive Services",
        AppName has "OpenAI" or tostring(TargetResources) has "OpenAI", "🤖 Azure OpenAI",
        AppName has "Copilot" or tostring(TargetResources) has "Copilot", "💼 Microsoft Copilot",
        AppName has "Bot" or tostring(TargetResources) has "Bot", "🤝 Bot Services",
        AppName has "ML" or AppName has "Machine Learning", "📊 Machine Learning",
        "⚙️ Other AI Services"
    ),
    SecurityLevel = case(
        PermissionsGranted has_any ("full_control", "admin", "owner", ".default"), "🔴 High Risk",
        PermissionsGranted has_any ("write", "contributor", "ReadWrite"), "🟠 Medium Risk",
        PermissionsGranted has_any ("read", "reader"), "🟡 Low Risk",
        "⚪ Unknown Risk"
    )
| project
    ['Time'] = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
    ['AI Service Type'] = AIServiceType,
    ['Application Name'] = coalesce(AppName, "Unknown Application"),
    ['Application ID'] = AppId,
    ['Authorization Operation'] = OperationName,
    ['Granted Permissions'] = PermissionsGranted,
    ['Risk Level'] = SecurityLevel,
    ['Executor'] = Actor,
    ['Operation Result'] = Result,
    TimeGenerated
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| project-away TimeGenerated
| take 30
content.title: 🔑 AI Service Access Authorization Monitoring

content.query:
//  AI Agent & Application Usage Tracking
// Tracks AI Agent and AI application usage from Entra ID
// Uses SigninLogs and AuditLogs for actual deployment and usage data
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
union isfuzzy=true
    (
    // AI Application sign-ins from Entra ID
    SigninLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > t0
    | where AppDisplayName has_any ("AI", "Agent", "Copilot", "GPT", "Chat", "Model", "Studio")
    | extend
        Source = "Entra ID - User Access",
        AgentName = AppDisplayName,
        AgentID = AppId,
        AgentType = case(
            AppDisplayName has "Copilot", "Microsoft Copilot",
            AppDisplayName has "AI Studio", "AI Studio Application",
            AppDisplayName has "GitHub", "GitHub Copilot",
            AppDisplayName has "Security", "Security Copilot",
            AppDisplayName has "Agent", "Custom Agent",
            "AI Application"
        ),
        DeploymentStatus = case(
            ResultType == 0, "Active",
            ResultType != 0, "Access Issues",
            "Unknown"
        ),
        Owner = UserPrincipalName,
        LastModified = TimeGenerated
    | project Source, AgentName, AgentID, AgentType, DeploymentStatus, Owner, LastModified
    ),
    (
    // AI Application management from AuditLogs
    AuditLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > t0
    | where OperationName has_any ("Add application", "Update application", "Add service principal")
    | where TargetResources[0].displayName has_any ("AI", "Agent", "Copilot", "GPT", "Model", "Studio")
    | extend
        Source = "Entra ID - App Management",
        AgentName = tostring(TargetResources[0].displayName),
        AgentID = tostring(TargetResources[0].id),
        AgentType = case(
            tostring(TargetResources[0].type) == "Application", "Enterprise Application",
            tostring(TargetResources[0].type) == "ServicePrincipal", "Service Principal",
            "Other App Type"
        ),
        DeploymentStatus = case(
            Result == "success", "Active",
            Result == "failure", "Failed",
            "Unknown"
        ),
        Owner = tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName),
        LastModified = TimeGenerated
    | project Source, AgentName, AgentID, AgentType, DeploymentStatus, Owner, LastModified
    )
| where isnotempty(AgentName)
| summarize
    TotalActivity = count(),
    ActiveCount = countif(DeploymentStatus == "Active"),
    FailedCount = countif(DeploymentStatus == "Access Issues" or DeploymentStatus == "Failed"),
    UniqueOwners = dcount(Owner),
    Owners = make_set(Owner, 5),
    FirstSeen = min(LastModified),
    LastActivity = max(LastModified),
    ActivityDays = datetime_diff('day', max(LastModified), min(LastModified)) + 1
  by Source, AgentName, AgentID, AgentType
| extend
    HealthStatus = case(
        FailedCount == 0 and ActiveCount > 0, " Healthy",
        FailedCount > 0 and ActiveCount > FailedCount, " Degraded",
        FailedCount >= ActiveCount, " Critical",
        "? Unknown"
    ),
    AgentAge = case(
        ActivityDays < 7, "New (< 1 week)",
        ActivityDays < 30, "Recent (< 1 month)",
        ActivityDays < 90, "Established (< 3 months)",
        "Mature (3+ months)"
    ),
    UsageFrequency = round(todouble(TotalActivity) / todouble(ActivityDays), 1)
| project
    ['Application Name'] = AgentName,
    ['Application Type'] = AgentType,
    ['Source'] = Source,
    ['Health Status'] = HealthStatus,
    ['Age'] = AgentAge,
    ['Total Activity'] = TotalActivity,
    ['Usage/Day'] = UsageFrequency,
    ['Active Sessions'] = ActiveCount,
    ['Failed/Issues'] = FailedCount,
    ['Unique Users'] = UniqueOwners,
    ['User List'] = tostring(Owners),
    ['First Seen'] = format_datetime(FirstSeen, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Last Activity'] = format_datetime(LastActivity, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Days Active'] = ActivityDays
| order by ['Total Activity'] desc, ['Last Activity'] desc
content.title: 📱 AI Application Usage & Access Tracking

content.json:
🔒 AI Data Governance & Privacy Protection

Author: Jason Liang

> **Value Statement**: This view leverages real data from Microsoft Purview and other security tools to monitor AI system data usage and sensitive data protection, ensuring organizational compliance with data governance policies and privacy regulations. By tracking data classification, usage, and access patterns through actual data sources, it helps security teams identify potential data leakage risks and unauthorized access.

📊 Data Sources & Classification

Monitor data used by AI models based on actual data classification and sensitive information from Purview analysis

🔍 Data Access Audit

Track data access patterns, anomalous behavior, and authorization compliance based on actual audit logs

---

content.query:
// AI-related Data Sensitivity Analysis - Fixed (Using Available Data Sources)
// Solution 1: Use CloudAppEvents to get file access information
let aiFilePatterns = dynamic(["model", "train", "data", "dataset", "ml", "ai", "predict", "analytics", "neural", "json", "csv", "pkl", "h5", "keras", "tensorflow", "pytorch"]);

CloudAppEvents
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where ActionType in ("FileAccessed", "FileDownloaded", "FileModified", "FileUploaded")
| where ObjectName has_any (aiFilePatterns) or ObjectId has_any (aiFilePatterns)
| extend 
    FileExtension = tostring(split(ObjectName, ".")[-1]),
    IsAIRelated = ObjectName has_any(aiFilePatterns) or ObjectId has_any(aiFilePatterns)
| where IsAIRelated
| extend 
    DataCategory = case(
        FileExtension in ("h5", "pb", "pt", "pkl", "onnx", "tflite", "bin"), "🤖 AI Model Files",
        FileExtension in ("json", "yaml", "yml", "toml", "ini", "config"), "⚙️ Configuration Files",
        FileExtension in ("csv", "tsv", "parquet", "avro", "xls", "xlsx"), "📊 Dataset Files",
        FileExtension in ("py", "ipynb", "r", "js"), "💻 Code Files",
        "📁 Other Files"
    ),
    SensitivityLevel = case(
        ObjectName has_any ("confidential", "secret", "sensitive", "personal", "pii"), "🔴 High Sensitivity",
        ObjectName has_any ("internal", "restricted"), "🟠 Medium Sensitivity", 
        ObjectName has "public", "🟢 Public",
        "⚪ Unclassified"
    )
| summarize 
    FileCount = count(),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(AccountDisplayName),
    SensitiveFileCount = countif(SensitivityLevel has "Sensitivity"),
    LastAccess = max(TimeGenerated)
  by DataCategory, SensitivityLevel, Application
| extend 
    SensitiveRatio = round(100.0 * SensitiveFileCount / FileCount, 1)
| project 
    ['Data Category'] = DataCategory,
    ['Sensitivity Label'] = SensitivityLevel,
    ['Application Platform'] = Application,
    ['Total Files'] = FileCount,
    ['Sensitive Files'] = SensitiveFileCount,
    ['Sensitivity Ratio'] = strcat(tostring(SensitiveRatio), '%'),
    ['Access Users'] = UniqueUsers,
    ['Last Access'] = format_datetime(LastAccess, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Sensitive Files'] desc
| take 25
content.title: 🔍 AI-related Data Sensitivity Analysis - Microsoft Purview

content.query:
// AI Data Access Audit Records (Fixed)
let aiDataPatterns = dynamic(["model", "train", "data", "dataset", "ml-", "ai-", "openai", "cognitive", "predict"]);

CloudAppEvents
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where ActionType in ("FileDownloaded", "FileAccessed", "FileModified", "FileUploaded")
| where ObjectName has_any (aiDataPatterns) or ObjectId has_any (aiDataPatterns) or Application has_any ("Copilot", "AI", "OpenAI")
| extend 
    AISensitivity = case(
        ObjectName has_any ("confidential", "secret", "sensitive", "personal", "pii"), "🔴 Sensitive AI Data",
        ObjectName has_any ("internal", "restricted"), "🟠 Internal AI Data",
        "🟢 General AI Data"
    ),
    AIDataType = case(
        ObjectName has_any ("model", ".h5", ".pb", ".pt", ".pkl", ".onnx"), "🤖 AI Model",
        ObjectName has_any ("dataset", "train", ".csv", ".json", "data"), "📊 Training Data",
        ObjectName has_any ("config", "parameter", "setting"), "⚙️ Configuration File", 
        Application has "Copilot", "💼 Copilot Data",
        "📁 Other AI Resources"
    ),
    AccessRisk = case(
        ActionType == "FileDownloaded" and ObjectName has_any ("confidential", "secret", "sensitive"), "🔴 High Risk Access",
        ActionType == "FileModified" and ObjectName has_any ("sensitive", "confidential"), "🟠 Medium Risk Access",
        ActionType == "FileUploaded", "📤 Data Upload",
        "🟢 Normal Access"
    )
| project 
    ['Time'] = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
    ['User'] = AccountDisplayName,
    ['Operation'] = ActionType,
    ['Resource Name'] = ObjectName,
    ['Data Type'] = AIDataType,
    ['Sensitivity'] = AISensitivity,
    ['Risk Rating'] = AccessRisk,
    ['IP Address'] = IPAddress,
    ['Application'] = Application,
    ['Device'] = DeviceType
| order by ['Time'] desc
| take 50
content.title: 📂 AI Data Access Audit Records

content.query:
// AI Data Access Pattern Analysis - Based on SigninLogs and AuditLogs (Fixed)
let aiApps = dynamic(["Copilot", "AI", "OpenAI", "Cognitive", "ChatGPT", "Claude", "Bard"]);

SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where AppDisplayName has_any (aiApps)
| extend 
    AIDataType = case(
        AppDisplayName has_any ("OpenAI", "GPT", "ChatGPT"), "🤖 AI Model Files",
        AppDisplayName has_any ("Copilot", "Microsoft 365"), "💼 Copilot Data",
        AppDisplayName has_any ("Cognitive", "AI Studio"), "📊 Training Datasets",
        AppDisplayName has_any ("Claude", "Bard"), "☁️ Third-party AI",
        "📁 Other AI Resources"
    ),
    SensitivityLevel = case(
        AppDisplayName has_any ("Enterprise", "Business", "Microsoft"), "🟢 Public",
        AppDisplayName has_any ("Personal", "Consumer", "Free"), "🔴 High Sensitivity",
        Location !in ("US", "CA", "GB", "AU"), "🟠 Medium Sensitivity",
        "⚪ Unclassified"
    )
| extend
    AccessRisk = case(
        SensitivityLevel == "🔴 High Sensitivity" and AIDataType == "🤖 AI Model Files", "🔴 High Risk Download",
        SensitivityLevel has "Sensitivity" and ResultType != 0, "🟠 Sensitive Data Modification",
        AppDisplayName has_any ("ChatGPT", "Claude", "Bard"), "📤 Data Upload",
        "🟢 Normal Access"
    )
| summarize 
    AccessCount = count(),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserPrincipalName),
    HighRiskAccess = countif(AccessRisk has "Risk"),
    LastAccess = max(TimeGenerated)
  by AIDataType, SensitivityLevel, AccessRisk
| project 
    ['AI Data Type'] = AIDataType,
    ['Sensitivity Level'] = SensitivityLevel,
    ['Access Risk'] = AccessRisk,
    ['Access Count'] = AccessCount,
    ['Users Involved'] = UniqueUsers,
    ['High Risk Access'] = HighRiskAccess,
    ['Last Access'] = format_datetime(LastAccess, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Access Count'] desc
content.title: 📊 AI Data Access Pattern Analysis

content.query:
// AI Application Data Compliance Monitoring (Based on SigninLogs and SecurityAlert)
let approvedAIApps = dynamic(["Security Copilot", "Azure AI Studio", "Microsoft 365 Copilot", "Bing Chat Enterprise"]);
let restrictedAIApps = dynamic(["ChatGPT", "Claude", "Google Bard", "Notion AI"]);

SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where AppDisplayName has_any ("AI", "Copilot", "chat", "gpt", "claude", "bard")
| extend 
    ComplianceStatus = case(
        AppDisplayName has_any (approvedAIApps), "✅ Compliant Application",
        AppDisplayName has_any (restrictedAIApps), "🚫 Restricted Application", 
        "⚠️ Unknown Application"
    ),
    UsageRisk = case(
        AppDisplayName has_any (restrictedAIApps) and Location !in ("US", "CA", "GB", "AU"), "🔴 High Risk Usage",
        AppDisplayName has_any (restrictedAIApps), "🟠 Non-compliant Usage",
        "🟢 Normal Usage"
    ),
    DataLocation = case(
        Location == "US", "🇺🇸 United States",
        Location == "CN", "🇨🇳 China", 
        Location == "GB", "🇬🇧 United Kingdom",
        Location == "CA", "🇨🇦 Canada",
        Location == "AU", "🇦🇺 Australia",
        strcat("🌐 ", Location)
    )
| summarize 
    LoginCount = count(),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserPrincipalName),
    RiskySessions = countif(UsageRisk has "Risk"),
    ViolationSessions = countif(UsageRisk has "compliant")
  by AppDisplayName, ComplianceStatus, UsageRisk, DataLocation
| project 
    ['AI Application'] = AppDisplayName,
    ['Compliance Status'] = ComplianceStatus,
    ['Usage Risk'] = UsageRisk,
    ['Data Location'] = DataLocation,
    ['Total Sign-ins'] = LoginCount,
    ['Unique Users'] = UniqueUsers,
    ['Risky Sessions'] = RiskySessions,
    ['Violation Sessions'] = ViolationSessions
| order by ['Violation Sessions'] desc, ['Risky Sessions'] desc
content.title: ✅ AI Application Data Compliance Monitoring

content.query:
//  Sensitive Data AI Processing Alert Analysis
// Tracks security alerts related to AI services accessing or processing sensitive data
// Uses SecurityAlert table for DLP and data security alerts
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > t0
| where AlertName has_any ("DLP", "Data", "Privacy", "Leak", "Exfiltration", "Sensitive", "Information")
| where Description has_any ("AI", "Copilot", "ChatGPT", "Model", "Prompt", "OpenAI", "Cognitive") or
        Entities has_any ("AI", "Copilot", "OpenAI")
| extend
    DataType = case(
        Description has_any ("PII", "personal", "SSN", "credit card", "passport"), " Personal Identification Information",
        Description has_any ("financial", "payment", "bank", "account"), " Financial Data",
        Description has_any ("health", "medical", "PHI", "patient"), " Health Data",
        Description has_any ("confidential", "secret", "classified", "proprietary"), " Confidential Information",
        Description has_any ("password", "credential", "token", "key"), "? Credentials",
        " General Sensitive Data"
    )
| extend
    AIContext = case(
        Description has "Copilot" or Entities has "Copilot", " Microsoft Copilot",
        Description has "ChatGPT" or Entities has "ChatGPT", " ChatGPT",
        Description has "OpenAI" or Entities has "OpenAI", " OpenAI Service",
        Description has "Cognitive" or Entities has "Cognitive", " Cognitive Services",
        Description has "Model", " AI Model",
        " Other AI Service"
    ),
    RiskScore = case(
        AlertSeverity == "High" and DataType has "Identification", 95,
        AlertSeverity == "High" and DataType has "Financial", 90,
        AlertSeverity == "High" and DataType has "Health", 90,
        AlertSeverity == "High" and DataType has "Credentials", 95,
        AlertSeverity == "High", 80,
        AlertSeverity == "Medium" and DataType has_any ("Identification", "Financial", "Health"), 70,
        AlertSeverity == "Medium", 60,
        AlertSeverity == "Low", 40,
        30
    )
| project
    ['Time'] = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['AI Service'] = AIContext,
    ['Data Type'] = DataType,
    ['Alert Severity'] = AlertSeverity,
    ['Risk Score'] = RiskScore,
    ['Alert Name'] = AlertName,
    ['Affected Entity'] = coalesce(CompromisedEntity, tostring(parse_json(tostring(Entities))[0]), "Unknown"),
    ['Status'] = Status,
    ['Description'] = substring(Description, 0, 100)
| order by ['Risk Score'] desc, ['Time'] desc
| take 30
content.title: 🔒 Sensitive Data AI Processing Alert Analysis
📊 AI Data Governance Compliance Score

content.query:
//  AI Agent Governance & Security Monitoring
// Azure AI Foundry and AI Studio agent deployment and compliance tracking
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
union isfuzzy=true
    (
    // Purview AI Hub - Agent governance logs
    PurviewAuditLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > t0
    | where OperationName has_any ("AIAgent", "Agent", "Deployment", "ModelDeploy")
    | extend
        Source = "Purview AI Hub",
        AgentName = tostring(TargetResources[0].displayName),
        Activity = OperationName,
        ComplianceStatus = case(
            ResultStatus == "Success" and OperationName has "Deploy", "Compliant",
            ResultStatus == "Failure", "Non-Compliant",
            OperationName has "Delete", "Under Review",
            "Pending"
        ),
        RiskLevel = case(
            ResultStatus == "Failure" or OperationName has "Delete", "High",
            OperationName has_any ("Modify", "Update"), "Medium",
            "Low"
        )
    | project TimeGenerated, Source, AgentName, Activity, ComplianceStatus, RiskLevel, User = UserId, IPAddress = ClientIP
    ),
    (
    // Azure AI Foundry - Agent audit logs  
    AuditLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > t0
    | where OperationName has_any ("AI", "Agent", "Model", "Deployment")
    | extend
        Source = "AI Foundry",
        AgentName = tostring(TargetResources[0].displayName),
        Activity = OperationName,
        ComplianceStatus = case(
            Result == "success" and OperationName has "Create", "Compliant",
            Result == "failure", "Non-Compliant",
            OperationName has "Delete", "Under Review",
            "Pending"
        ),
        RiskLevel = case(
            Result == "failure", "High",
            OperationName has "Delete", "High",
            OperationName has_any ("Update", "Modify"), "Medium",
            "Low"
        )
    | project TimeGenerated, Source, AgentName, Activity, ComplianceStatus, RiskLevel, User = tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName), IPAddress = tostring(InitiatedBy.user.ipAddress)
    ),
    (
    // AI Studio access - Sign-in governance
    SigninLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > t0
    | where AppDisplayName has_any ("AI Studio", "AI Foundry", "Azure AI")
    | extend
        Source = "AI Studio Access",
        AgentName = "N/A",
        Activity = strcat("Sign-in: ", AppDisplayName),
        ComplianceStatus = case(
            ResultType == "0" and RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "none", "Compliant",
            RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "high", "Non-Compliant",
            ResultType != "0", "Non-Compliant",
            "Pending"
        ),
        RiskLevel = case(
            RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "high" or ResultType != "0", "High",
            RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "medium", "Medium",
            "Low"
        )
    | project TimeGenerated, Source, AgentName, Activity, ComplianceStatus, RiskLevel, User = UserPrincipalName, IPAddress
    )
| summarize
    TotalActivities = count(),
    CompliantCount = countif(ComplianceStatus == "Compliant"),
    NonCompliantCount = countif(ComplianceStatus == "Non-Compliant"),
    HighRiskCount = countif(RiskLevel == "High"),
    MediumRiskCount = countif(RiskLevel == "Medium"),
    UniqueAgents = dcountif(AgentName, AgentName != "N/A"),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(User),
    UniqueIPs = dcount(IPAddress),
    FirstActivity = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastActivity = max(TimeGenerated)
  by Source
| extend
    ComplianceRate = round((todouble(CompliantCount) / todouble(TotalActivities)) * 100, 1),
    RiskScore = (HighRiskCount * 3) + (MediumRiskCount * 2) + NonCompliantCount
| extend GovernanceStatus = case(
    ComplianceRate >= 95 and RiskScore < 10, "Excellent Governance",
    ComplianceRate >= 85 and RiskScore < 20, "Good Governance",
    ComplianceRate >= 70 and RiskScore < 40, "Needs Improvement",
    "Poor Governance - Action Required"
)
| project
    ['Data Source'] = Source,
    ['Governance Status'] = GovernanceStatus,
    ['Total Activities'] = TotalActivities,
    ['Compliance Rate %'] = ComplianceRate,
    ['Risk Score'] = RiskScore,
    ['Compliant'] = CompliantCount,
    ['Non-Compliant'] = NonCompliantCount,
    ['High-Risk Events'] = HighRiskCount,
    ['Unique Agents'] = UniqueAgents,
    ['Unique Users'] = UniqueUsers,
    ['Unique IPs'] = UniqueIPs,
    ['First Activity'] = format_datetime(FirstActivity, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Last Activity'] = format_datetime(LastActivity, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Risk Score'] desc, ['Total Activities'] desc
content.title: 🤖 AI Agent Governance & Compliance Monitoring

content.query:
//  AI Agent Content Safety & Prompt Shield Violations
// Simplified query for Content Safety monitoring
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > t0
| extend AlertNameLower = tolower(AlertName), DescriptionLower = tolower(Description)
| where AlertNameLower has_any ("content", "prompt", "shield", "safety", "jailbreak", "injection", "toxic", "harmful", "abuse", "violation") or
        DescriptionLower has_any ("content", "prompt", "shield", "safety", "jailbreak", "injection", "toxic", "harmful")
| extend
    ViolationType = case(
        AlertNameLower has "prompt" and AlertNameLower has_any ("injection", "shield"), "🛡️ Prompt Shield - Injection Attack",
        AlertNameLower has "jailbreak", "🚨 Jailbreak Attempt",
        AlertNameLower has "hate" or DescriptionLower has "hate", "⚠️ Content Safety - Hate Speech",
        AlertNameLower has "violence" or DescriptionLower has "violence", "🔴 Content Safety - Violence",
        AlertNameLower has "sexual" or DescriptionLower has "sexual", "🔞 Content Safety - Sexual Content",
        AlertNameLower has "selfharm" or DescriptionLower has "self-harm", "⚕️ Content Safety - Self-Harm",
        AlertNameLower has "toxic" or DescriptionLower has "toxic", "☠️ Toxicity Detection",
        "⚠️ Other Content Violation"
    ),
    UserPrincipal = coalesce(CompromisedEntity, tostring(parse_json(tostring(Entities))[0].Name), "Unknown User")
| summarize
    ViolationCount = count(),
    CriticalCount = countif(AlertSeverity == "High"),
    MediumCount = countif(AlertSeverity == "Medium"),
    LowCount = countif(AlertSeverity == "Low"),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserPrincipal),
    FirstViolation = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastViolation = max(TimeGenerated),
    SampleAlerts = make_set(AlertName, 3)
  by ViolationType, AlertSeverity
| extend
    SeverityScore = case(
        AlertSeverity == "High", ViolationCount * 5,
        AlertSeverity == "Medium", ViolationCount * 3,
        ViolationCount * 1
    )
| project
    ['Violation Type'] = ViolationType,
    ['Severity'] = AlertSeverity,
    ['Total Violations'] = ViolationCount,
    ['Severity Score'] = SeverityScore,
    ['Critical Events'] = CriticalCount,
    ['Medium Events'] = MediumCount,
    ['Low Events'] = LowCount,
    ['Unique Users'] = UniqueUsers,
    ['Sample Alerts'] = tostring(SampleAlerts),
    ['First Violation'] = format_datetime(FirstViolation, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Last Violation'] = format_datetime(LastViolation, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Severity Score'] desc, ['Total Violations'] desc
content.title: 🛡️ AI Agent Content Safety & Prompt Shield Violations

content.json:
🎨 Multimodal AI Threat Detection

Author: Jason Liang

> **Value Statement**: Emerging threat detection for multimodal AI systems spanning text, images, audio, and video. Covers deepfake attacks, cross-modal injection, synthetic media detection, biometric spoofing, and other advanced attack techniques. Addresses security risks in multimodal LLMs including GPT-4V, Claude-3, and Gemini.

🎭 Deepfake Detection

Detect AI-generated fake images, videos, and audio content

🔀 Cross-Modal Attacks

Analyze cross-modal attacks such as text→image, audio→video

---

content.query:
// Multimodal AI Usage & Security Overview
// Based on Azure AI Services, OpenAI, and Application logs
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
union isfuzzy=true
    (
    AzureDiagnostics
    | where TimeGenerated > t0
    | where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES" or Category contains "OpenAI"
    | extend ServiceType = case(
        properties_s contains "vision" or properties_s contains "image" or OperationName contains "Vision", "Computer Vision",
        properties_s contains "speech" or properties_s contains "audio" or OperationName contains "Speech", "Speech Services",
        properties_s contains "video" or OperationName contains "Video", "Video Analysis",
        properties_s contains "gpt-4" or properties_s contains "dalle" or OperationName contains "OpenAI", "GPT-4/DALL-E",
        "Text Processing"
    )
    | extend RiskIndicator = case(
        OperationName contains "Delete" or ResultType == "Failure", "High Risk",
        properties_s contains "error" or httpStatusCode_d >= 400, "Medium Risk",
        "Normal"
    )
    | project TimeGenerated, ServiceType, RiskIndicator, OperationName, ResultType, CallerIPAddress
    ),
    (
    SigninLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > t0
    | where AppDisplayName has_any ("OpenAI", "Cognitive", "Vision", "Speech")
    | extend ServiceType = "AI Service Access"
    | extend RiskIndicator = case(
        RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "high" or RiskLevelAggregated == "high", "High Risk",
        RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "medium" or RiskLevelAggregated == "medium", "Medium Risk",
        "Normal"
    )
    | project TimeGenerated, ServiceType, RiskIndicator, OperationName = AppDisplayName, ResultType = ResultType, CallerIPAddress = IPAddress
    )
| summarize 
    TotalRequests = count(),
    HighRiskCount = countif(RiskIndicator == "High Risk"),
    MediumRiskCount = countif(RiskIndicator == "Medium Risk"),
    UniqueIPs = dcount(CallerIPAddress),
    FailureCount = countif(ResultType == "Failure" or ResultType != "0"),
    FirstActivity = min(TimeGenerated),
    LatestActivity = max(TimeGenerated)
  by ServiceType
| extend 
    RiskScore = (HighRiskCount * 3) + (MediumRiskCount * 2) + FailureCount,
    SuccessRate = round((todouble(TotalRequests - FailureCount) / todouble(TotalRequests)) * 100, 1)
| extend ThreatLevel = case(
    RiskScore >= 50, "🔥 Critical Threat",
    RiskScore >= 20, "🔴 High Threat",
    RiskScore >= 5, "🟠 Medium Threat",
    "🟢 Low Threat"
)
| project 
    ['Service Type'] = ServiceType,
    ['Threat Level'] = ThreatLevel,
    ['Total Requests'] = TotalRequests,
    ['Risk Score'] = RiskScore,
    ['High-Risk Events'] = HighRiskCount,
    ['Medium-Risk Events'] = MediumRiskCount,
    ['Failure Count'] = FailureCount,
    ['Success Rate %'] = SuccessRate,
    ['Unique IP Count'] = UniqueIPs,
    ['First Activity'] = format_datetime(FirstActivity, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Latest Activity'] = format_datetime(LatestActivity, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Risk Score'] desc, ['Total Requests'] desc
content.title: 🎨 Multimodal AI Usage & Security Overview

content.query:
// AI Service Usage Trend Analysis
// Monitors AI service sign-in trends over selected time period
let lookbackDays = toint({TrendDays});
let t0 = ago(lookbackDays * 1d);
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > t0
| extend AppNameLower = tolower(AppDisplayName), ResourceLower = tolower(ResourceDisplayName)
| where AppNameLower has_any ("openai", "cognitive", "vision", "speech", "ai", "copilot", "azure", "microsoft") or
        ResourceLower has_any ("openai", "cognitive", "ai")
| extend ServiceCategory = case(
    AppNameLower has "vision" or ResourceLower has "vision", "🖼️ Vision Services",
    AppNameLower has "speech" or ResourceLower has "speech", "🎤 Speech Services",
    AppNameLower has "openai" or ResourceLower has "openai", "🤖 OpenAI Services",
    AppNameLower has "copilot", "💼 Microsoft Copilot",
    AppNameLower has "cognitive" or ResourceLower has "cognitive", "🧠 Cognitive Services",
    "🔧 Other AI Services"
)
| extend IsSuccess = iff(ResultType == "0", 1, 0)
| extend IsAnomaly = iff(RiskLevelDuringSignIn in ("high", "medium") or ResultType != "0", 1, 0)
| extend DayBucket = bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| summarize 
    TotalEvents = count(),
    SuccessfulEvents = countif(IsSuccess == 1),
    FailedEvents = countif(IsSuccess == 0),
    AnomalousEvents = countif(IsAnomaly == 1),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserPrincipalName),
    UniqueApps = dcount(AppDisplayName)
  by DayBucket, ServiceCategory
| extend 
    SuccessRate = round((todouble(SuccessfulEvents) / todouble(TotalEvents)) * 100, 1),
    AnomalyRate = round((todouble(AnomalousEvents) / todouble(TotalEvents)) * 100, 1)
| extend Trend = case(
    AnomalyRate >= 30, "🔴 High Risk",
    AnomalyRate >= 10, "🟠 Medium Risk",
    AnomalyRate > 0, "🟡 Low Risk",
    "🟢 Normal"
)
| project 
    ['Date'] = format_datetime(DayBucket, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
    ['Service Category'] = ServiceCategory,
    ['Status'] = Trend,
    ['Total Events'] = TotalEvents,
    ['Successful'] = SuccessfulEvents,
    ['Failed'] = FailedEvents,
    ['Anomalous'] = AnomalousEvents,
    ['Unique Users'] = UniqueUsers,
    ['Unique Apps'] = UniqueApps,
    ['Success Rate % ✅'] = SuccessRate,
    ['Anomaly Rate % ⚠️'] = AnomalyRate
| order by ['Date'] desc, ['Total Events'] desc
| take 100
content.title: 🎨 AI Service Usage Trend Analysis (Last {TrendDays} Days)

content.query:
// AI Service User Behavior Analysis
// Identifies users with unusual AI service access patterns
let t0 = {TimeRange:start};
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > t0
| where AppDisplayName has_any ("OpenAI", "Cognitive", "Vision", "Speech", "Azure AI", "Azure OpenAI")
   or ResourceDisplayName has_any ("Azure OpenAI", "Cognitive Services", "Azure AI")
| extend 
    RiskScore = case(
        RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "high", 3,
        RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "medium", 2,
        RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "low", 1,
        0
    ),
    IsFailure = iff(ResultType != "0", 1, 0)
| summarize 
    TotalSignins = count(),
    FailedSignins = sum(IsFailure),
    UniqueApps = dcount(AppDisplayName),
    UniqueIPs = dcount(IPAddress),
    TotalRiskScore = sum(RiskScore),
    Apps = make_set(AppDisplayName, 5),
    Locations = make_set(Location, 3),
    FirstAccess = min(TimeGenerated),
    LatestAccess = max(TimeGenerated)
  by UserPrincipalName, UserDisplayName
| extend 
    CombinedRiskScore = TotalRiskScore + (FailedSignins * 2),
    SuccessRate = round((todouble(TotalSignins - FailedSignins) / todouble(TotalSignins)) * 100, 1)
| extend ThreatProfile = case(
    CombinedRiskScore >= 50 or UniqueIPs >= 10, "🔴 High-Risk User",
    CombinedRiskScore >= 20 or UniqueIPs >= 5, "🟠 Medium-Risk User",
    CombinedRiskScore > 0, "🟡 Low-Risk User",
    "🟢 Normal User"
)
| extend AccessDuration = datetime_diff('day', LatestAccess, FirstAccess)
| where CombinedRiskScore > 0 or FailedSignins > 0
| project 
    ['User'] = UserDisplayName,
    ['UPN'] = UserPrincipalName,
    ['Threat Profile'] = ThreatProfile,
    ['Risk Score'] = CombinedRiskScore,
    ['Total Signins'] = TotalSignins,
    ['Failed Signins'] = FailedSignins,
    ['Success Rate %'] = SuccessRate,
    ['Unique Apps'] = UniqueApps,
    ['Unique IPs'] = UniqueIPs,
    ['Access Duration (Days)'] = AccessDuration,
    ['AI Services'] = strcat_array(Apps, ', '),
    ['Locations'] = strcat_array(Locations, ', '),
    ['First Access'] = format_datetime(FirstAccess, 'MM-dd HH:mm'),
    ['Latest Access'] = format_datetime(LatestAccess, 'MM-dd HH:mm')
| order by ['Risk Score'] desc, ['Total Signins'] desc
| take 20
content.title: 🎨 AI Service User Behavior Analysis
